CN_014.title: 昇進Ⅱ
CN_014.text: 人生は刹那、躍起になってあくせくしてたら、息つく間はあるんですかねぇ？つまりね、あれこれ考えずに、今を楽しんどきゃーいいんですよ。いくら心配したって、起こるべくして起こる問題からは逃げられないんでね、起きた時に解決すれば万事オーケーってことです。

CN_017.title: 編成
CN_017.text: おれも同行必須、と？はぁ……はいはい、行きますよ。

CN_018.title: 隊長任命
CN_018.text: よーし、みぃんなおれの指示に従えよ。そんじゃ、各員解散！――ってちょっと、本気で帰らないでくださいって。冗談ですよ、冗談。

CN_019.title: 作戦準備
CN_019.text: 学校の遠足みたいですねぇ。

CN_020.title: 戦闘開始
CN_020.text: 狭路にて相逢えば「勇」ある者勝つ、とは限らないんだなぁこれが。

CN_021.title: 選択時1
CN_021.text: あなたならきっとうまく……ってちょっと、おれが出るんですか？

CN_022.title: 選択時2
CN_022.text: よしよし、安心してちょーだい。おれがいるでしょう。

CN_023.title: 配置1
CN_023.text: 皆さま方、何をお話で？

CN_024.title: 配置2
CN_024.text: ちーと叱ってやりましょう、ほどほどにね。

CN_025.title: 作戦中1
CN_025.text: いいですか、和をもって財を生ず、ですよ。

CN_026.title: 作戦中2
CN_026.text: おっと、まあまあ落ちついて。茶がこぼれるでしょうが！

CN_027.title: 作戦中3
CN_027.text: 皆々さま方、再検討のほど何卒――本当に、議論の余地なしなんですかねぇ？

CN_028.title: 作戦中4
CN_028.text: はぁ、言わんこっちゃない。落ち着けってあれだけ言ったのにねぇ。

CN_029.title: 高難度作戦クリア
CN_029.text: どうも。いやーDr.ドクターのおかげです……一つ借りですねぇ、覚えときます。

CN_030.title: ★3で戦闘終了
CN_030.text: 惚れ惚れするような腕前ですねぇDr.ドクター。えっ、さっきはどこにいたかって？そりゃあもちろん、皆さんを信じてずうっと応援してたんですよ。

CN_031.title: ★2以下戦闘終了
CN_031.text: やや、待ってください。去る者追わず、ですよ。放っておきましょう。

CN_032.title: 作戦失敗
CN_032.text: あーぶねえ危ねえ。とんでもない卦象が出てますよ、逃げ足早くて助かりましたねぇ。

CN_033.title: 基地配属
CN_033.text: Dr.ドクター？ほい、これをどーぞ。部屋の飾りにでもしてください。あ、でも枕元はダメですよ。効果ですか？はは、そりゃ言えませんねぇ。

CN_034.title: タッチ1
CN_034.text: 言いたいことは言葉でお願いします、ちょっ、手を出すのはナシでしょうが……

CN_036.title: 信頼タッチ
CN_036.text: ここは禁煙？いや、こりゃタバコじゃありませんよ、スティックキャンディってやつです。信じられないなら一本どうです？

CN_042.title: 挨拶
CN_042.text: リー探偵事務所へようこそ。ご依頼承り……あれ？誰かと思えば、Dr.ドクターでしたか。

CN_001.title: 어시스턴트 임명
CN_001.text: 자료 정리? 어이쿠… 갑자기 두통이 오는걸. 이대론 안 되겠네, 좀 쉬어야겠어. 그러니까 힘내세요, 박사님. 이 정도 양은, 당신이라면 여유롭잖아요?

CN_002.title: 대화 1
CN_002.text: 의뢰? 물론 상관없습니다, 이야기를 들어볼까요… 탐정 이외의 업무? 그레이 존? 하하, 우리는 그런 거 안 합니다. 선량한 시민들이 모이는 사무소니까요, 제대로 된 장사만 한다고요.

CN_003.title: 대화 2
CN_003.text: 아 녀석을 와이후랑 훔이 돌봐주니, 저는 상당히 마음이 편합니다. 이거 참 부끄럽네요, 애들 돌보는 건 내 일이라 해놓고는, 결국 이쪽이 도움을 받고 있다고요. 요즘 젊은 녀석들은 착실해서, 뭐 다행인 일이지만요.

CN_004.title: 대화 3
CN_004.text: 여러분이 마음 써 주신 덕분에, 사무소도 그럭저럭 번창 중입니다. 용문은 인정 넘치는 곳이니까요, 오래 살다 보면 인맥도 넓어지고 나름대로 노하우도 쌓이지요. 이 업계에선 폭력으로 해결하는 건 꼴불견이니까, 어떤 일이든 평화적으로 해결할 수 있다면 최고라는 거예요.

CN_005.title: 1차 정예화 후 대화
CN_005.text: 박사님 어떤가요, 제이가 만든 생선 완자 괜찮죠? 동씨가 요리 기술부터 의리와 인정의 도리까지, 전부 녀석한테 주입한 것 같아요. 이 정도 맛이라면 용문 제일이죠. 자자, 식기 전에 드셔 주세요, 몸이 따뜻해 질 겁니다.

CN_006.title: 2차 정예화 후 대화
CN_006.text: 여기, 이 항목 말입니다만, 왼쪽에서 세 번째 줄이 틀렸길래 고쳐 뒀습니다. 감사는 됐습니다. 익숙해 보이나요? 그렇지는 않습니다, 사무소 안건 외에 이런 소액 정산 같은 건 처음이에요. 옛날에는 훨씬… 아차, 이야기가 많이 엇나갔군요. 부디 신경 쓰지 마시길.

CN_007.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 1
CN_007.text: 이런 시간에 불이 켜져 있다니… 어라? 아 박사님이었군요. 아직도 작전기록을 정리하는 건가요? 정말이지, 당신이 그렇게 열심히 일한다고는 생각 못 했습니다. 눈물이 나는군요. 그래도, 일찍 쉬는 게 최고입니다. 밤샘으로 몸을 망치면 아깝잖아요.

CN_008.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 2
CN_008.text: 모두 부와 명예에 혈안이지만, 득도 있으면 실도 있는 법이니, 결과가 좋은 사람은 과연 몇이나 될까요? 평범한 나날을 보내는 것조차, 이젠 사치스러운 바람이 돼 버렸죠. 하아, 이런 얘기는 그만하죠. 안주를 만들어 올 테니 조금 기다려 주세요. 한잔합시다, 박사님.

CN_009.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 3
CN_009.text: 외출은 삼가라는 점괘가 나와서요, 오늘 임무는 패스를… 아, 역시 안 되나요? 참여 필수에 징징대도 소용없다? 하아, 그런가요. 그럼 이번에는 특별히 당신을 위해 힘이 되어 드릴 테니, 돌아오면 한턱내시지요! 자자, 결정했습니다. 이 가게로 하죠!

CN_010.title: 방치
CN_010.text: 정신없이 살 바에는, 천천히 차라도 마시는 게 좋죠. 흐음. 좋은 찻잎을 갖고 계셨군요, 박사님.

CN_011.title: 오퍼레이터 입사
CN_011.text: 처음 뵙겠습니다, 당신이 박사님이죠? 우리 애들이 항상 신세를 지고 있습니다. 녀석들이 여러분께 폐를 끼치고 있지는 않겠죠? 아 맞다, 이게 사무소 명함입니다. 받으시죠.

CN_012.title: 작전기록 학습
CN_012.text: 솜씨를 겨뤄 보시겠어요? 아니 아니, 농담이에요. 싸움은 서툴러서요.

CN_013.title: 1차 정예화 (승진)
CN_013.text: 승진인가요? …처음 경험하는지라, 좀 신선한 기분이네요. 이럴 땐 '사장님 영광입니다'라고 해야 하나요?

CN_014.title: 2차 정예화 (승진)
CN_014.text: 인생은 찰나, 기를 쓰고 악착같이 군다면 숨 쉴 틈은 있을까요? 즉, 이것저것 따지지 말고, 지금을 즐기면 되는 겁니다. 아무리 걱정해도 일어날 수밖에 없는 일에선 도망칠 수 없거든요. 일어났을 때 해결하면 만사 OK인 겁니다.

CN_017.title: 팀 배치
CN_017.text: 나도 동행 필수라고? 하아… 예예, 갑니다요.

CN_018.title: 팀장 임명
CN_018.text: 좋았어, 모두 내 지시에 따라라. 그럼, 전원 해산! …아니 잠깐, 진짜로 돌아가지 말고요. 농담입니다, 농담

CN_019.title: 작전 출발
CN_019.text: 학교 소풍 같네요.

CN_020.title: 작전 개시
CN_020.text: 좁은 길에서 마주치면 용기 있는 자가 이긴다, 라고 할 수만은 없겠네 이거.

CN_021.title: 오퍼레이터 선택 1
CN_021.text: 당신이라면 분명 잘… 아니 잠깐, 내가 가는 건가요?

CN_023.title: 배치 1
CN_023.text: 여러분, 무슨 말씀 하시는 거죠?

CN_024.title: 배치 2
CN_024.text: 조금 혼내 줄까요. 적당히 말이죠

CN_025.title: 작전 중 1
CN_025.text: 아셨나요. 화목함이 부를 가져다주는 겁니다

CN_027.title: 작전 중 3
CN_027.text: 여러분, 재검토를 부디… 정말로 논의할 여지조차 없는 겁니까?

CN_028.title: 작전 중 4
CN_028.text: 하아, 말했잖아. 진정하라고 그렇게나 말했는데.

CN_029.title: 고난이도 작전 종료
CN_029.text: 감사합니다. 아니요, 박사님 덕분입니다… 하나 빚졌네요. 기억해 두겠습니다.

CN_030.title: 3★ 작전 종료
CN_030.text: 반할 것만 같은 솜씨로군요, 박사님. 앗, 아까는 어디 있었냐고요? 그거야 물론, 여러분들을 믿고 계속 응원 중이었죠.

CN_031.title: 비 3★ 작전 종료
CN_031.text: 이런, 기다려 주세요. 떠나는 사람을 쫓을 필요는 없습니다. 내버려 두죠.

CN_032.title: 작전 실패
CN_032.text: 위험하다 위험해. 터무니없는 점괘가 나왔어요. 도망치는 게 빨라서 살았네요.

CN_033.title: 시설에 배치
CN_033.text: 박사님? 자, 이거 받으세요. 방에 장식이라도 해 두세요. 아, 근데 머리맡에 두는 건 안 됩니다. 효과요? 하하, 그건 말할 수 없네요.

CN_034.title: 터치
CN_034.text: 하고 싶은 말이 있으면 말로 해 주세요. 아니, 손대지는 마시고요…

CN_036.title: 신뢰도 터치
CN_036.text: 여기는 금연인가요? 아니, 이건 담배가 아닙니다. 막대 사탕이라는 거죠. 못 믿겠으면 하나 하실래요?

CN_042.title: 인사
CN_042.text: 리 탐정사무소에 오신 걸 환영합니다. 의뢰를… 어라? 누군가 했더니, 박사님이었군요.

CN_001.title: 任命助理
CN_001.text: 我仍会保护你的安全，博士。不仅是出于任务需要，任何一次重逢都很难得。

CN_002.title: 交谈1
CN_002.text: 回叙拉古的感觉？不怎么样。那里属于帮派与家族，不属于我。我决定暂时留下，只是为了与过去彻底做个了断。等到这些麻烦都解决了，我会回龙门，载上那些家伙，好好开车兜一次风。

CN_003.title: 交谈2
CN_003.text: 我不想把企鹅物流卷进来，但当我在叙拉古看到她们时，还是感到安心。自由的生活，吵闹的伙伴......当初来到龙门，与她们相处，是我做过最正确的选择。这些话，别告诉她们。

CN_004.title: 交谈3
CN_004.text: 德克萨斯家族覆灭的故事，偶尔会听到叙拉古人谈起。每个版本都不一样，大部分很无聊，有的编得还不错，但都只是故事。当时......我只是感到疲倦，然后决定离开。

CN_005.title: 晋升后交谈1
CN_005.text: 你注意过外墙上的雨渍吗？肮脏的雨带不来洁净，这就是叙拉古，叙拉古人习惯这一切，我不习惯。

CN_006.title: 晋升后交谈2
CN_006.text: 我对成为灰厅的一员没有兴趣。坐在那里的人，每个都各怀心思，装腔作势。我选择面对西西里夫人，只是因为......她自以为可以驯化所有人，我很讨厌这一点。

CN_007.title: 信赖提升后交谈1
CN_007.text: 我在叙拉古见过拉普兰德。她已经很久没出现过了？那家伙并不需要别人担心，她不再执着于我，也会去砍其他东西。至于我们之间的胜负，并不重要。我们很快会再见的。

CN_008.title: 信赖提升后交谈2
CN_008.text: 我在哥伦比亚出生，但爷爷希望我成为一名合格的家族成员，所以送我到叙拉古接受训练。我依然不明白，为什么这里的人那么喜欢通心粉？我曾经也有常去的店，它已经消失了，老板死在了巷子里。

CN_009.title: 信赖提升后交谈3
CN_009.text: 在叙拉古，好像很多人在揣摩我的行动。没那么复杂，我只是做想要做的事，帮值得帮的人。博士，我们之间的相处，维持以前的样子就好。这种可以真正信赖的关系，在那里并不多见。

CN_010.title: 闲置
CN_010.text: 休息时间。这里不会有阴影中的杀手，巷子里的狼。

CN_011.title: 干员报到
CN_011.text: 又见面了，博士。叙拉古的雨季容易弄湿尾巴，这里的环境更舒适。别担心，快递业务能天使她们会继续受理，不过，如果仍有指派给我个人的任务，我也会执行。

CN_012.title: 观看作战记录
CN_012.text: 谢谢，和在龙门运送货物基本没什么不同。

CN_013.title: 精英化晋升1
CN_013.text: 我协助你的行动不是为了报酬，博士。嗯......不过，请照旧把薪资支付给企鹅物流，我还会找大帝要的。

CN_014.title: 精英化晋升2
CN_014.text: 为了平静的生活，我还有很多事情需要处理，如果摆脱过去的方法只有粉碎它，那我就会粉碎它。就这么简单。

CN_017.title: 编入队伍
CN_017.text: 很清晰的任务目标，已经确认。

CN_018.title: 任命队长
CN_018.text: 好吧，跟上我的节奏，如果认为有难度，提前说出来。

CN_019.title: 行动出发
CN_019.text: 不需要闹出太大动静。

CN_020.title: 行动开始
CN_020.text: 别留下血迹，很难清理。

CN_023.title: 部署1
CN_023.text: 有什么问题需要解决？

CN_024.title: 部署2
CN_024.text: 我看到他了，马上就好。

CN_025.title: 作战中1
CN_025.text: 很不幸，你遇到我了。

CN_027.title: 作战中3
CN_027.text: 遗言转述？我不受理。

CN_028.title: 作战中4
CN_028.text: 这样能让你安静下来。

CN_029.title: 完成高难行动
CN_029.text: 不论障碍是什么，扫清它，然后继续前进，这是真正解决问题的唯一方法。

CN_030.title: 3星结束行动
CN_030.text: 没有伴随爆炸与欢呼的战斗，稍微有点不适应。回去吧，喝一杯就免了。

CN_031.title: 非3星结束行动
CN_031.text: 清理还没有彻底完成，下一次扫除计划在哪里？

CN_032.title: 行动失败
CN_032.text: 我还能再干掉几个，你先撤离。

CN_033.title: 进驻设施
CN_033.text: 这里让我想到了还在龙门的日子。不常有雨声，很安静。

CN_036.title: 信赖触摸
CN_036.text: 博士，吹风机在哪？我想把尾巴烘干。

CN_042.title: 问候
CN_042.text: 嗯，和以前一样，这再好不过。早，有什么新计划吗？

CN_001.title: 任命助理
CN_001.text: 我仍会保护你的安全，博士。不仅是出于任务需要，任何一次重逢都很难得。

CN_011.text: 又见面了，博士。叙拉古的雨季容易弄湿尾巴，这里的环境更舒适。别担心，快递业务能天使她们会继续受理，不过，如果仍有指派给我个人的任务，我也会执行。

CN_012.text: 谢谢，和在龙门运送货物基本没什么不同。

CN_018.text: 好吧，跟上我的节奏，如果认为有难度，提前说出来。

CN_019.text: 不需要闹出太大动静。

CN_020.title: 行动开始
CN_020.text: 别留下血迹，很难清理。

CN_023.text: 有什么问题需要解决？

CN_024.title: 部署2
CN_024.text: 我看到他了，马上就好。

CN_025.text: 很不幸，你遇到我了。

CN_027.text: 遗言转述？我不受理。

CN_028.title: 作战中4

CN_031.text: 清理还没有彻底完成，下一次扫除计划在哪里？

CN_032.title: 行动失败
CN_032.text: 我还能再干掉几个，你先撤离。

CN_033.title: 进驻设施
CN_033.text: 这里让我想到了还在龙门的日子。不常有雨声，很安静。

CN_036.title: 信赖触摸
CN_036.text: 博士，吹风机在哪？我想把尾巴烘干。

CN_042.title: 问候
CN_042.text: 嗯，和以前一样，这再好不过。早，有什么新计划吗？

CN_001.title: Appointed as Assistant
CN_001.text: I'm your bodyguard again, just like old times, Doctor. And it's not just a job, it's a reunion. That's something worth cherishing.

CN_002.title: Talk 1
CN_002.text: How does it feel to be back in Siracusa? Not great. It's for wise guys and famiglie, not me. I'm only staying long enough to cut ties with the past. After I'm done washing my hands of the whole business, I'm heading back to Lungmen to pick up the girls, and then going out for a nice drive.

CN_003.title: Talk 2
CN_003.text: I didn't want to get Penguin Logistics involved, but it was a relief to see them in Siracusa. My noisy friends, that life of freedom... Looking back now, staying with them in Lungmen was the best decision I ever made. Just, don't tell them I said that.

CN_004.title: Talk 3
CN_004.text: Sometimes I hear Siracusans talking about the downfall of Famiglia Texas. No two versions of the story are the same. Most are pretty dull, and some make for interesting fairytales, but in the end, they're all pretty embellished. The real story is... I just got exhausted, and decided to leave.

CN_005.title: Talk after Promotion 1
CN_005.text: Ever noticed how even the rain here stains the walls outside? Dirty rainwater can't wash anything clean. And that's Siracusa. Siracusans might be used to it, but I'm not.

CN_006.title: Talk after Promotion 2
CN_006.text: I've got no interest in joining Greyhall. The dons sit in their chairs, acting all high and mighty, hiding their plans. I decided to confront Signora Sicilia because she thinks she can tame everyone, and that's one thing I can't stand.

CN_007.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
CN_007.text: I saw Lappland in Siracusa. Oh, you haven't seen her in a while? Not like she needs anyone worrying about her. If she's over me now, she'll find something else to cut. As for the score we haven't settled, I say it doesn't matter. We'll meet again soon enough.

CN_008.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
CN_008.text: I was born in Columbia, but my grandfather wanted me to become a proper mafiosa and sent me to Siracusa to learn the trade. But to this day I don't understand why the people here like macaroni so much? I used to go to this little place for macaroni myself, but it closed down a long time ago. The owner died in a back alley.

CN_009.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
CN_009.text: In Siracusa, there were a whole lot of people trying to guess what I'd do. It wasn't that complicated. I was there to do what I had to do, and help those who deserved help. Doctor, all I ask is that we continue to get along just like we used to. This relationship, built on real trust, is hard to find there.

CN_010.title: Idle
CN_010.text: It's quiet here. No hitmen haunting the shadows, no wolves waiting in the alleys.

CN_011.title: Onboard
CN_011.text: We meet again, Doctor. The Siracusan rainy season always gets my tail wet, so I prefer the climate here. Don't worry, Exusiai and the girls will keep taking care of the deliveries, but I'll handle any jobs assigned to me personally.

CN_012.title: Watching Battle Record
CN_012.text: Thanks. Doesn't seem much different from your average delivery run in Lungmen.

CN_013.title: Promotion 1
CN_013.text: I'm not helping you for the money, Doctor. But still, go ahead and send my salary over to Penguin Logistics as usual. I'll pick it up from Emperor.

CN_014.title: Promotion 2
CN_014.text: I still have a lot to take care of before I can enjoy a peaceful life, and if the only way to shake the past is to smash it to pieces, then that's exactly what I'll do. Simple as that.

CN_017.title: Added to Squad
CN_017.text: Order confirmed, crystal clear.

CN_018.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
CN_018.text: Alright. Try to keep up. Let me know if you can't.

CN_019.title: Depart
CN_019.text: No need to make a scene.

CN_020.title: Begin Operation
CN_020.text: Don't leave bloodstains. They're hard to clean.

CN_023.title: Deployment 1
CN_023.text: Got a problem that needs solving?

CN_024.title: Deployment 2
CN_024.text: I see them. I'll be right back.

CN_025.title: In Battle 1
CN_025.text: Bad luck, you ran into me.

CN_027.title: In Battle 3
CN_027.text: Pass on your last words? No.

CN_028.title: In Battle 4
CN_028.text: This will keep you quiet.

CN_029.title: 4-star Result
CN_029.text: The only way to solve a problem is to clear all the obstacles in the way, no matter what they might be and keep moving.

CN_030.title: 3-star Result
CN_030.text: A battle without an explosion or cheering makes me feel a little uneasy. Let's head back. A drink? Maybe next time.

CN_031.title: Sub 3-star Result
CN_031.text: There's still more to clean. When's our next sweep?

CN_032.title: Operation Failure
CN_032.text: I can take out a few more. You go ahead and retreat.

CN_033.title: Assigned to Facility
CN_033.text: This place reminds me of Lungmen. It's quiet. Doesn't have the constant pitter patter of the rain.

CN_036.title: Trust Tap
CN_036.text: Doctor, where's the hair dryer? I'd like to dry my tail.

CN_042.title: Greeting
CN_042.text: Great, this place is the same as it ever was. Morning. Got any new plans?

CN_001.title: Appointed as Assistant
CN_001.text: I'm your bodyguard again, just like old times, Doctor. And it's not just a job, it's a reunion. That's something worth cherishing.

CN_002.title: Talk 1
CN_002.text: How does it feel to be back in Siracusa? Not great. It's for wise guys and famiglie, not me. I'm only staying long enough to cut ties with the past. After I'm done washing my hands of the whole business, I'm heading back to Lungmen to pick up the girls, and then going out for a nice drive.

CN_003.title: Talk 2
CN_003.text: I didn't want to get Penguin Logistics involved, but it was a relief to see them in Siracusa. My noisy friends, that life of freedom... Looking back now, staying with them in Lungmen was the best decision I ever made. Just, don't tell them I said that.

CN_004.title: Talk 3
CN_004.text: Sometimes I hear Siracusans talking about the downfall of Famiglia Texas. No two versions of the story are the same. Most are pretty dull, and some make for interesting fairytales, but in the end, they're all pretty embellished. The real story is... I just got exhausted, and decided to leave.

CN_005.title: Talk after Promotion 1
CN_005.text: Ever noticed how even the rain here stains the walls outside? Dirty rainwater can't wash anything clean. And that's Siracusa. Siracusans might be used to it, but I'm not.

CN_006.title: Talk after Promotion 2
CN_006.text: I've got no interest in joining Greyhall. The dons sit in their chairs, acting all high and mighty, hiding their plans. I decided to confront Signora Sicilia because she thinks she can tame everyone, and that's one thing I can't stand.

CN_007.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
CN_007.text: I saw Lappland in Siracusa. Oh, you haven't seen her in a while? Not like she needs anyone worrying about her. If she's over me now, she'll find something else to cut. As for the score we haven't settled, I say it doesn't matter. We'll meet again soon enough.

CN_008.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
CN_008.text: I was born in Columbia, but my grandfather wanted me to become a proper mafiosa and sent me to Siracusa to learn the trade. But to this day I don't understand why the people here like macaroni so much? I used to go to this little place for macaroni myself, but it closed down a long time ago. The owner died in a back alley.

CN_009.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
CN_009.text: In Siracusa, there were a whole lot of people trying to guess what I'd do. It wasn't that complicated. I was there to do what I had to do, and help those who deserved help. Doctor, all I ask is that we continue to get along just like we used to. This relationship, built on real trust, is hard to find there.

CN_010.title: Idle
CN_010.text: It's quiet here. No hitmen haunting the shadows, no wolves waiting in the alleys.

CN_011.title: Onboard
CN_011.text: We meet again, Doctor. The Siracusan rainy season always gets my tail wet, so I prefer the climate here. Don't worry, Exusiai and the girls will keep taking care of the deliveries, but I'll handle any jobs assigned to me personally.

CN_012.title: Watching Battle Record
CN_012.text: Thanks. Doesn't seem much different from your average delivery run in Lungmen.

CN_013.title: Promotion 1
CN_013.text: I'm not helping you for the money, Doctor. But still, go ahead and send my salary over to Penguin Logistics as usual. I'll pick it up from Emperor.

CN_014.title: Promotion 2
CN_014.text: I still have a lot to take care of before I can enjoy a peaceful life, and if the only way to shake the past is to smash it to pieces, then that's exactly what I'll do. Simple as that.

CN_017.title: Added to Squad
CN_017.text: Order confirmed, crystal clear.

CN_018.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
CN_018.text: Alright. Try to keep up. Let me know if you can't.

CN_019.title: Depart
CN_019.text: No need to make a scene.

CN_020.title: Begin Operation
CN_020.text: Don't leave bloodstains. They're hard to clean.

CN_023.title: Deployment 1
CN_023.text: Got a problem that needs solving?

CN_024.title: Deployment 2
CN_024.text: I see them. I'll be right back.

CN_025.title: In Battle 1
CN_025.text: Bad luck, you ran into me.

CN_027.title: In Battle 3
CN_027.text: Pass on your last words? No.

CN_028.title: In Battle 4
CN_028.text: This will keep you quiet.

CN_029.title: 4-star Result
CN_029.text: The only way to solve a problem is to clear all the obstacles in the way, no matter what they might be and keep moving.

CN_030.title: 3-star Result
CN_030.text: A battle without an explosion or cheering makes me feel a little uneasy. Let's head back. A drink? Maybe next time.

CN_031.title: Sub 3-star Result
CN_031.text: There's still more to clean. When's our next sweep?

CN_032.title: Operation Failure
CN_032.text: I can take out a few more. You go ahead and retreat.

CN_033.title: Assigned to Facility
CN_033.text: This place reminds me of Lungmen. It's quiet. Doesn't have the constant pitter patter of the rain.

CN_036.title: Trust Tap
CN_036.text: Doctor, where's the hair dryer? I'd like to dry my tail.

CN_042.title: Greeting
CN_042.text: Great, this place is the same as it ever was. Morning. Got any new plans?

CN_001.title: 秘書任命
CN_001.text: 引き続きドクターの身辺警護にあたる。任務のためだけでなく、貴重な再会のためにも。

CN_002.title: 会話1
CN_002.text: シラクーザに戻った感想？ろくなものじゃない。派閥やファミリーがせめぎ合うシラクーザに、もはや私の入る隙間などありはしない。しばらく残ることにしたのは、過去と決別するために過ぎないんだ。面倒事がすべて片付いたら、龍門に帰って、馴染みの連中と心ゆくまでドライブするさ。

CN_003.title: 会話2
CN_003.text: ペンギン急便を巻き込みたくはなかったが、シラクーザで見知った顔を見た時は、やはり安堵を覚えたものだ。自由な生活、騒がしい仲間……龍門を訪れた時に、あいつらと共に歩むことを選んだのは、これまでで一番正しい選択だったと思う。この話は、あいつらにはしてくれるなよ。

CN_004.title: 会話3
CN_004.text: 時々、シラクーザ人からテキサスファミリー崩壊の物語を聞かされる。どれも内容はまちまちで、つまらないものばかりだが、なかなかよくできた話もある。だが結局、どれも作り話に過ぎない。あの時私は……ただ疲弊していて、離れる決意をするに至ったというだけのことだ。

CN_005.title: 昇進後会話1
CN_005.text: シラクーザの都市外壁の雨染みを気にしたことはあるか？汚れた雨を何度浴びせても、決して清められはしない……それがシラクーザという国だ。シラクーザ人にとってはそれが当たり前だが、私はどうしても慣れないんだ。

CN_006.title: 昇進後会話2
CN_006.text: 元よりグレイホールに加わることに興味はなかった。あそこに籍を置いている連中は、腹に一物を抱えて虚勢を張っている奴ばかりだからな。私がミズ・シチリアに楯突くことを選んだのは、ただ……あの誰でも飼い慣らせるという態度が癪に障ったからだ。

CN_007.title: 信頼上昇後会話1
CN_007.text: そういえば、シラクーザでラップランドと会ったんだ。もうずいぶん長く姿を見せていない？あいつのことなら心配するだけ無駄だ。私への執着がなくなっても、次に斬りたいものを見つけているはずさ。それに、私たちの勝負に関しても取るに足らないことだ。どの道すぐに再会することになる。

CN_008.title: 信頼上昇後会話2
CN_008.text: 私はクルビア生まれだが、ファミリーの一員に足る実力を付けるために、お爺様によってシラクーザへ修行に出されたんだ。それにしても、シラクーザ人の異様なまでのマカロニ好きは未だに理解できない。私にも行きつけの店はあったが、店主の死体が路地裏で見つかって、それっきりさ。

CN_009.title: 信頼上昇後会話3
CN_009.text: シラクーザにいると、あちこちの連中から行動を分析されているような気配を感じる。だが私は単純にやりたいことをやって、助ける価値のある奴を助けているだけだ。ドクター、私たちの付き合いもこれまで通りで頼む。こんな風に心から信頼し合える関係は、あそこでは珍しいんだ。

CN_010.title: 放置
CN_010.text: 一休みしよう。ここでは物陰の殺し屋や、路地裏の狼に気を病む必要はないんだ。

CN_011.title: 入職会話
CN_011.text: また会えたな、ドクター。シラクーザの雨期は尻尾が湿って不快だから、ここはずいぶん過ごしやすく感じるよ。心配しなくても、宅配業務はエクシアたちがこれまで通り引き受ける。ただもし私個人への依頼があれば、引き続き対応しよう。

CN_012.title: 経験値上昇
CN_012.text: ありがとう。龍門での配送業務とそう変わらないな。

CN_013.title: 昇進Ⅰ
CN_013.text: ドクターに協力しているのは報酬のためではない。いや、そうだな……報酬の支払いはこれまで通りペンギン急便に頼む。後ほどボスに請求するからな。

CN_014.title: 昇進Ⅱ
CN_014.text: 平穏に暮らすためにも、やるべきことはまだまだある。過去から脱却するにはそれを打ち砕くほかないのなら、お望み通り打ち砕いてやろう。簡単な話だ。

CN_017.title: 編成
CN_017.text: 明確な作戦目標だな、了解した。

CN_018.title: 隊長任命
CN_018.text: 仕方ない、だが私に合わせてもらうぞ。難しそうなら今のうちに言ってくれ。

CN_019.title: 作戦準備
CN_019.text: 派手にやる必要はない。

CN_020.title: 戦闘開始
CN_020.text: 血は残すな。後片付けが面倒になる。

CN_022.title: 選択時2
CN_022.text: さっさと片付ければ楽に終わる。

CN_023.title: 配置1
CN_023.text: 何を片付ければいい？

CN_024.title: 配置2
CN_024.text: ターゲット確認。すぐに終わらせる。

CN_025.title: 作戦中1
CN_025.text: 私に出会ったのが運の尽きだ。

CN_026.title: 作戦中2
CN_026.text: ここでは何も起きていない。

CN_027.title: 作戦中3
CN_027.text: 遺言の伝達？断る。

CN_028.title: 作戦中4
CN_028.text: これで静かになってくれるな。

CN_029.title: 高難度作戦クリア
CN_029.text: 道を阻むものが何であれ、排除して進み続けるのが唯一の解決法だ。

CN_030.title: ★3で戦闘終了
CN_030.text: 爆発や歓声の伴わない戦闘にはなかなか慣れないな。帰ろう、仕事の後の一杯は遠慮しておく。

CN_031.title: ★2以下戦闘終了
CN_031.text: まだ掃除は終わっていない。次の目標地点はどこだ？

CN_032.title: 作戦失敗
CN_032.text: まだ何人かやれる、ドクターは先に撤退してくれ。

CN_033.title: 基地配属
CN_033.text: ここにいると龍門での日々を思い出す。雨の音も滅多に聞こえないし、静かで良い場所だ。

CN_036.title: 信頼タッチ
CN_036.text: ドクター、ドライヤーはあるか？尻尾を乾かしたいんだ。

CN_042.title: 挨拶
CN_042.text: うん、これまで通りで何よりだ。おはよ、予定は決まっているか？

CN_001.text: 引き続きドクターの身辺警護にあたる。任務のためだけでなく、貴重な再会のためにも。

CN_001.title: 어시스턴트 임명
CN_001.text: 박사, 계속해서 네 신변 경호를 맡도록 하지. 임무를 위해서만이 아니라, 소중한 재회를 위해서도.

CN_002.title: 대화 1
CN_002.text: 시라쿠사에 돌아온 기분? 딱히, 아무렇지도 않아. 시라쿠사는 여러 파벌들이나 패밀리가 엮여 있을 뿐, 나랑은 상관없으니까. 내가 잠깐 머물기로 한 것도 그저 과거를 마무리 짓기 위해서일 뿐이야. 귀찮은 문제들을 전부 해결하고 나면, 나도 용문으로 돌아가서 그 녀석들을 태우고 드라이브나 하려고.

CN_003.title: 대화 2
CN_003.text: 펭귄 로지스틱스를 이번 일에 휘말리게 하고 싶진 않았어, 하지만 시라쿠사에서 그 녀석들을 만났을 땐 안심이 되더라고. 자유로운 생활, 그리고 소란스러운 동료들…… 용문에서 그 녀석들과 함께하기로 했던 건, 여태까지 했던 선택 중에서 가장 잘한 일이었다고 생각해. 이 얘기는 그 녀석들한테는 하지 말아 줘.

CN_004.title: 대화 3
CN_004.text: 시라쿠사 사람들한테 텍사스 패밀리의 몰락에 대한 얘기를 가끔씩 듣곤 해. 내용은 전부 제각각이고, 대부분 시시한 내용이지만 꽤 그럴듯한 얘기도 있었지. 하지만 결국 모두 지어낸 얘기에 불과해. 그때의 난…… 지칠 대로 지쳐서, 떠날 결심을 했을 뿐이야.

CN_005.title: 1차 정예화 후 대화
CN_005.text: 도시 외벽에 있는 빗자국을 본 적 있어? 더러운 비를 아무리 쏟아내 봤자 깨끗해지는 건 없어…… 이게 시라쿠사라는 곳이야. 시라쿠사 사람에겐 당연한 얘기지만, 난 아무래도 익숙해지지 않아.

CN_006.title: 2차 정예화 후 대화
CN_006.text: 그레이 홀에 속해 있는 녀석들은 전부 허세와 꿍꿍이로 가득 차 있지. 그러니 그 일원이 되는 것에는 관심이 없어. 시칠리아 부인에게 맞서기로 결심했던 건…… 누구나 길들일 수 있을 거라고 생각하는 그 태도가 너무 역겨웠기 때문이야.

CN_007.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 1
CN_007.text: 그러고 보니 시라쿠사에서 라플란드를 만났어. 꽤 오랫동안 모습을 드러내지 않았다고? 그 녀석이라면 걱정하지 않아도 괜찮아. 나에 대한 집착이 사라졌다 해도, 결국 그다음에 벨 것을 찾고 있을 테니까. 우리 사이의 승부도 별로 중요한 일은 아니야. 어차피 곧 다시 만나게 되겠지.

CN_008.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 2
CN_008.text: 난 컬럼비아에서 태어났지만, 할아버지는 내가 패밀리의 일원으로서 자격을 갖추길 바랐기에 시라쿠사로 수행을 보내셨어. 난 시라쿠사 사람들이 왜 그렇게 마카로니를 좋아하는지 아직도 이해가 안 돼. 나도 단골 가게가 있긴 했지만, 이미 없어졌어. 가게 주인의 시체가 뒷골목에서 발견됐거든.

CN_009.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 3
CN_009.text: 시라쿠사에 있으면 사람들이 내 행동을 분석하는 듯한 느낌이 들어. 하지만 난 그저, 계속해서 하고 싶은 일을 하고, 도울 가치가 있는 녀석을 도울 뿐이야. 박사, 우리의 관계도 지금까지처럼 부탁할게. 이렇게 진심으로 신뢰할 수 있는 관계는, 저쪽에선 드물거든.

CN_010.title: 방치
CN_010.text: 잠깐 쉬자. 여기라면 그림자 속에 숨은 킬러나, 뒷골목의 늑대를 걱정할 필요는 없어.

CN_011.title: 오퍼레이터 입사
CN_011.text: 또 보네, 박사. 시라쿠사의 장마철에는 꼬리가 쉽게 젖었는데, 이곳은 그러지 않아서 더 지내기 편한 것 같아. 택배 업무는 예전처럼 엑시아 쪽에서 담당할 거야. 하지만 혹시라도 나한테 맡길 개인적인 의뢰가 있다면 내가 맡도록 할게.

CN_012.title: 작전기록 학습
CN_012.text: 고마워. 용문에서 하던 물류 업무와 크게 다르진 않은 것 같네.

CN_013.title: 1차 정예화 (승진)
CN_013.text: 보수 때문에 박사에게 협력하는 건 아니었는데. 음…… 그래도 보수는 지금처럼 펭귄 로지스틱스 쪽으로 보내 줘. 그럼 나중에 보스한테 청구할게.

CN_014.title: 2차 정예화 (승진)
CN_014.text: 평화로운 생활을 위해선 아직 처리해야 할 일이 많아. 만약 과거에서 벗어나기 위해 그것을 때려 부숴야 한다면, 난 기꺼이 때려 부술 거야. 정말 간단한 일이지.

CN_017.title: 팀 배치
CN_017.text: 명확한 임무 목표로군, 확인했다.

CN_018.title: 팀장 임명
CN_018.text: 어쩔 수 없네, 우선은 내게 맞춰줘. 어려울 것 같으면 지금 말해주고.

CN_019.title: 작전 출발
CN_019.text: 쓸데없이 소란을 피울 필요는 없겠지.

CN_020.title: 작전 개시
CN_020.text: 핏자국을 남기지 마, 처리하기 힘들거든.

CN_023.title: 배치 1
CN_023.text: 내가 뭘 해결해줘야 하지?

CN_024.title: 배치 2
CN_024.text: 목표 확인. 금방 끝내지.

CN_025.title: 작전 중 1
CN_025.text: 운이 없었군, 나랑 마주치다니.

CN_027.title: 작전 중 3
CN_027.text: 유언을 전해 달라고? 거절한다.

CN_028.title: 작전 중 4
CN_028.text: 이걸로 조용해졌으면 좋겠네.

CN_029.title: 고난이도 작전 종료
CN_029.text: 문제를 해결하기 위해선, 내 앞을 가로막는 장애물을 전부 치워 버리고 계속해서 나아간다는 방법밖에 없다.

CN_030.title: 3★ 작전 종료
CN_030.text: 폭발이나 환호성이 없는 전투는 좀처럼 익숙해지질 않네. 돌아가자, 퇴근 후에 한잔하는 건 사양하도록 하지.

CN_031.title: 비 3★ 작전 종료
CN_031.text: 아직 '청소'가 끝나지 않았다. 다음 계획은 어디로 가면 되지?

CN_032.title: 작전 실패
CN_032.text: 아직 몇 명 더 해치울 수 있어, 박사는 먼저 철수해.

CN_033.title: 시설에 배치
CN_033.text: 여기 있으면 용문에서 보낸 시간이 떠오르곤 해. 빗소리도 별로 들리지 않고, 조용하고 좋은 곳이지.

CN_036.title: 신뢰도 터치
CN_036.text: 박사, 드라이기 있어? 꼬리를 말리고 싶은데.

CN_042.title: 인사
CN_042.text: 응, 예전과 같아서 좋네. 좋은 아침, 혹시 새로운 계획이라도 있어?

CN_001.title: 어시스턴트 임명
CN_001.text: 박사, 계속해서 네 신변 경호를 맡도록 하지. 임무를 위해서만이 아니라, 소중한 재회를 위해서도.

CN_033.text: 여기 있으면 용문에서 보낸 시간이 떠오르곤 해. 빗소리도 별로 들리지 않고, 조용하고 좋은 곳이지.

CN_036.text: 박사, 드라이기 있어? 꼬리를 말리고 싶은데.

CN_042.title: 인사
CN_042.text: 응, 예전과 같아서 좋네. 좋은 아침, 혹시 새로운 계획이라도 있어?

CN_001.title: 任命助理
CN_001.text: 你从时间里找到了什么，神秘的黑市之主？过去，艾利奥特。我一直在寻找过去。也许我能从仙人掌和流沙的规律中找到归宿，而你我都不知道命运的答案。

CN_002.title: 交谈1
CN_002.text: 我憎恶那里的一切。即使顺应那枚金币意味着向命运妥协，我还是不得不离开萨尔贡。但是我还在这里，沙卒。你无法远离你的全部。命运这个词在你我之间已是定数。

CN_003.title: 交谈2
CN_003.text: 萨尔贡会在你的身上留下伤痕，在雇主眼里，你柔弱得像是一只可怜的羽兽。我已经忘记被鞭笞的感觉，你痛恨他们吗？不。我知道他们的结局，从你的眼睛里知道的。万幸，你似乎并不后悔。

CN_004.title: 交谈3
CN_004.text: 可你的神情没有给我答案。你不是把那一切付诸一炬了吗？黑市有一处可以瞥见天空的广场，你记得夜晚令你回想起什么吗？我声称那是火葬，可当阴谋得逞，烈焰四起，我想到的却不是恩师的面庞。

CN_005.title: 晋升后交谈1
CN_005.text: “索恩之赐”。你还记得它的第一枚零件吗？把道德感埋进黄沙，去欺骗一位恰好失去儿子的看守，得到那枚劣质的施术单元？以及......“索恩之赐”？老师会赐予阴谋家什么呢，异客？

CN_006.title: 晋升后交谈2
CN_006.text: 告诉我，矿石病改变了我们的生活吗？你会觉得痛苦吗？疾病会把我变成什么样？那些幕后黑手失算了吗？你在发抖，可怜的艾利奥特。忘了那些动机吧，现在，我只会在镜子前感叹它的美。

CN_007.title: 信赖提升后交谈1
CN_007.text: 春天的生意最是繁忙。夏天则被节日点缀。秋天是离开伊巴特而谋求利益的好时节，冬天则属于战争。这就是萨尔贡的四季，你即将痛恨的四季。但......伊巴特的夏夜能看清星星。

CN_008.title: 信赖提升后交谈2
CN_008.text: 被捏造的梦境真是神奇。我该怎么和你相处，未来的博士？如果我早些遇见你们——不。博士并不存在于你我之间的任何节点。他属于我的时间。让他撒手去做，我对他寄予厚望。

CN_009.title: 信赖提升后交谈3
CN_009.text: 一个瓦伊凡，还有那个“博士”。你难道在索求他们的怜悯吗？不。我只想得到我的先知，或者，成为他人的先知。旷日持久的虚无远比病痛更加折磨......艾利奥特，听我说，我有些累了。

CN_010.title: 闲置
CN_010.text: ......睡吧，我的艾利奥特。睡去之后，我们会做同一个梦。梦见你成为我，梦见我还是你。

CN_011.title: 干员报到
CN_011.text: 我翻开了旧日的命运吗？不，这只是一个梦，一个你避之如讳的梦。我的未来。

CN_012.title: 观看作战记录
CN_012.text: 我时常看见一些阴谋......是的。艾利奥特。还有那些争斗，那些物欲横流。它们无处不在。

CN_013.title: 精英化晋升1
CN_013.text: 矿石病让我的未来所剩无几，我多希望罗德岛能抓紧利用我的价值。这不对。罗德岛没有人能满足你的自毁倾向。不是他们太仁慈，而是你太严苛。这是艾利奥特·格罗夫的判断。

CN_014.title: 精英化晋升2
CN_014.text: 你醒来的时候会看见萨尔贡的冬天吗？你会在永恒的盛夏睡去吗？我必须成为你吗？预言只是命运的伪装。安心睡吧，艾利奥特。你塑造了我，而我会成就你。直到预言没有提及的时刻到来。

CN_017.title: 编入队伍
CN_017.text: 你为什么不挑选更多的同伴？这样事半功倍。你会明白的。很多事情都会让你明白的。

CN_018.title: 任命队长
CN_018.text: 艾利奥特一定会这么问我：一个空虚的灵魂如何真挚地领导他人？

CN_019.title: 行动出发
CN_019.text: 我还记得背着重伤的老师时，背后的触感，那是战争的触感。可战争有利可图。

CN_020.title: 行动开始
CN_020.text: 曾经我所有的战斗都为了一个目的。失去了目的，就将斗争交还给过去吧。

CN_022.title: 选中干员2
CN_022.text: 你还记得流沙的触感吗？

CN_023.title: 部署1
CN_023.text: 我的战争兵器定会如你所愿。

CN_024.title: 部署2
CN_024.text: 而“人”才是最后的兵器。

CN_025.title: 作战中1
CN_025.text: 我还记得这些设备是如何诞生的。

CN_026.title: 作战中2
CN_026.text: 以恩师的名义战斗，又能得到什么？

CN_027.title: 作战中3
CN_027.text: 感性不会带来胜利。

CN_028.title: 作战中4
CN_028.text: 复仇已经结束了。

CN_029.title: 完成高难行动
CN_029.text: 黑市的冬天是没有雪的。我还能看见雪吗？会的。只是那个银白色的天地里，不再有你熟悉的任何事物。

CN_030.title: 3星结束行动
CN_030.text: 你的诡计会追上所有人，你就是如此成为黑市之主的吗？是的，你也会的，艾利奥特。我很清楚。你不会放过任何一个。

CN_031.title: 非3星结束行动
CN_031.text: 你看见那些受罚者逃跑的模样了吗？看见了。我在想，那些哥伦比亚人，是否也是这么看着我的？

CN_032.title: 行动失败
CN_032.text: 允许我们犯错的时光一去不复返了。我们在对抗一个过于强大的敌人。命运？不，是我们自己。

CN_033.title: 进驻设施
CN_033.text: 罗德岛使你心安理得吗？是咖啡因的功效。

CN_036.title: 信赖触摸
CN_036.text: 珍惜你的回忆，珍惜你还情感丰富的时刻。我理解。至少我还能理解。

CN_042.title: 问候
CN_042.text: 我梦见了一个未来。在四季流转的景色里，一切归于虚无，没有恶梦，也没有美梦，徒留......黑暗。那的确是命运的答案，艾利奥特。那黑暗不代表任何东西，只是......虚无本身。

CN_001.title: Appointed as Assistant
CN_001.text: What did you find in time, mysterious master of the black market? The past, Elliot. I have always been seeking the past. Perhaps I will find a home in the patterns of the cacti and quicksand, but neither you nor I know the answer of fate.

CN_002.title: Talk 1
CN_002.text: I detest everything there. I have no choice but to leave Sargon, even if obeying the coin meant acquiescing to fate. But I am here, Sand Soldier. You can't escape what you are. Our destinies have already been written.

CN_003.title: Talk 2
CN_003.text: Sargon leaves marks on you. To the employer, you are feeble as a fledging fowlbeast. I forgot how it feels to be put to the lash. Do you hate them? No. I know their end. I know it from your eyes. Fortunately, you do not seem to regret it.

CN_004.title: Talk 3
CN_004.text: Your expression gives no answer. Did you not put it all to the torch? There is a plaza in the black market with a view of the sky. Do you remember what night reminds you of? I called it a cremation, but when the conspirators had their way and the flames raged, it was not the face of my teacher that that came to mind.

CN_005.title: Talk after Promotion 1
CN_005.text: Do you remember the first component of Thorne's Gift? The shoddy Arts Unit that was obtained by burying conscience in the sand and deceiving a guard who lost his son? And... Thorne's Gift? What will a teacher give to an evil mastermind, Passenger?

CN_006.title: Talk after Promotion 2
CN_006.text: Tell me. Has Oripathy changed our lives? Do you feel pain? How will the illness transform me? Have the schemers behind the scenes miscalculated? You are trembling, poor Elliot. Never mind the cause. Now, all I do is marvel at its beauty in the mirror.

CN_007.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
CN_007.text: Business is best in the spring. Festivals adorn the summer. Autumn is the season to seek fortune away from Ibut. Winter belongs to war. These are the seasons of Sargon, seasons that you will come to hate... but the stars shine bright on summer nights in Ibut.

CN_008.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
CN_008.text: Strange things, fabricated dreams are. What should I say to you, Doctor of the future? If I had met you earlier... no. The Doctor does not exist at any point between you and I. The Doctor belongs to my time, and may act as the Doctor wills. I have high hopes for the Doctor.

CN_009.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
CN_009.text: A Vouivre, and the 'Doctor'. Are you begging for their pity? No, I simply want to learn about my future, or tell others about theirs. Eternal nothingness is worse than any illness... listen to me, Elliot. I feel a little tired.

CN_010.title: Idle
CN_010.text: Sleep, my Elliot. Sleep and dream together with me. In our dreams, you will become me, and I will still be you.

CN_011.title: Onboard
CN_011.text: Have I flipped open the pages of destinies past? No, it is but a dream, a dream that you seek to avoid. My future.

CN_012.title: Watching Battle Record
CN_012.text: I see conspiracies... yes, Elliot. The conflicts, the greed. They are everywhere.

CN_013.title: Promotion 1
CN_013.text: Oripathy has robbed me of my future. I hope that Rhodes Island can make use of what I have left. No. Rhodes Island does not exist to indulge your desire for self-harm. It is not that they are too kind; it is that you are too harsh. This is Elliot Glover's conclusion.

CN_014.title: Promotion 2
CN_014.text: Will you see the Sargon of winter when you awaken? Will you sleep away in the eternal summer? Must I become you? Prophecy is fate in disguise. Sleep, Elliot. You built me, and I complete you, until the day the prophecies no longer foretell.

CN_017.title: Added to Squad
CN_017.text: Why do you not seek more companions? It is inefficient. You will understand. Many things will make you understand.

CN_018.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
CN_018.text: Elliot would have asked me: How does an empty soul lead others with sincerity?

CN_019.title: Depart
CN_019.text: I remember the feeling of carrying my injured teacher on my back. It was the feeling of war. But war is profitable.

CN_020.title: Begin Operation
CN_020.text: I fought for a single purpose. Let war be the past, then, if the purpose is lost.

CN_022.title: Selecting Operator 2
CN_022.text: Do you remember the touch of quicksand?

CN_023.title: Deployment 1
CN_023.text: My war machine will fulfill your wishes.

CN_024.title: Deployment 2
CN_024.text: 'Man' is the ultimate weapon.

CN_025.title: In Battle 1
CN_025.text: I remember how this equipment was born.

CN_026.title: In Battle 2
CN_026.text: What is there to be gained by fighting in the name of my teacher?

CN_027.title: In Battle 3
CN_027.text: Sentimentality does not bring victory.

CN_028.title: In Battle 4
CN_028.text: Vengeance ends.

CN_029.title: 4-star Result
CN_029.text: There is no snow in the winter of the black market. Will I still see snow? Yes, but there will be nothing you recognize in that world of silvery white.

CN_030.title: 3-star Result
CN_030.text: Your machinations will catch up to everyone. Is this how you became the master of the black market? Yes, you will too, Elliot. I know that well. You will not let anyone escape.

CN_031.title: Sub 3-star Result
CN_031.text: Did you see how the chastened fled? I saw them. I wonder if that was how those Columbians saw me.

CN_032.title: Operation Failure
CN_032.text: The days to permit mistakes are gone, never to return. We are fighting an enemy too powerful for us. Fate? No, ourselves.

CN_033.title: Assigned to Facility
CN_033.text: Do you find Rhodes Island comforting? It's more the caffeine.

CN_036.title: Trust Tap
CN_036.text: Treasure your memories, treasure a time when you still had emotions. I understand; at least, I still do.

CN_042.title: Greeting
CN_042.text: I dreamt of a future. Everything became nothing as the seasons changed. No sweet dreams, no nightmares... only the darkness remained. That is the answer of fate, Elliot. The darkness means nothing. It is Nothing itself.

CN_001.title: 秘書任命
CN_001.text: あなたは時の中で何を見出したのですか、神秘に包まれし闇市の主？過去です、エリオット。私は絶えず過去を探しているのです。あるいはサボテンと流砂の理法の中に終着点を見つけ出すことができるかもしれませんが、運命がもたらす答えはあなたも私も知るべくもない。

CN_002.title: 会話1
CN_002.text: 私はあの場所のすべてを憎悪しています。かの金貨の示す通りに進むことが、運命に頭を垂れることを意味するとしても、私はサルゴンを離れずにはいられなかったのです。でも僕はまだここにいますよ、サンドソルジャー。あなたが、己のすべてを捨てることは不可能です。運命という言葉は、あなたと僕の間では既に移ろうことのない定数なのですから。

CN_003.title: 会話2
CN_003.text: サルゴンはあなたの身体に傷跡を残し、雇い主の目にはあなたは哀れな羽獣のように、か弱く映るでしょう。私はもう、鞭打たれる感覚を忘れてしまいました。彼らを恨んでいますか？いいえ。僕は彼らの最期を知っていますから。そう、あなたの眼差しを通して。幸い、あなたは後悔していないようです。

CN_004.title: 会話3
CN_004.text: でも、あなたの表情からは何の答えも得られません。あの場所の一切を炎で葬ったのではないのですか？闇市には空を垣間見ることのできる広場がありましたね。夜があなたの記憶から揺り起したものを覚えていますか？私はあれを火葬だと称しましたが、筋書き通りに事が運び、猛（たけ）る業火を前にした時、思い浮かんだのは恩師の顔ではなかったのですよ。

CN_005.title: 昇進後会話1
CN_005.text: 「ソーンの賜物」。あれの初めてのパーツを覚えていますか？道徳を黄砂の下に埋め、折良くも息子を亡くした看守を騙して得た、質の悪いアーツユニットのことですか？それに……「ソーンの賜物」？先生が陰謀家に何を与えるというのですか、パッセンジャー。

CN_006.title: 昇進後会話2
CN_006.text: 教えてください、鉱石病は僕たちの生活を変えましたか？あなたは苦痛を感じますか？病は僕をどう変えてしまうんですか？あの黒幕たちの企みは失敗に終わったのでしょうか？震えていますね、哀れなエリオットよ。始まりに囚われることはありません。今はただ、鏡の前でこの結晶の美しさに見惚れるばかりですよ。

CN_007.title: 信頼上昇後会話1
CN_007.text: 春は商いの書き入れ時。夏は行事で彩られ、秋はイバトを離れ多くの利を手繰るのに良い時分。そして、冬は戦争の時節。これがサルゴンの四季――あなたがこれから骨の髄まで憎むことになる四季です。でも……イバトの夏の夜は、星が綺麗に見えます。

CN_008.title: 信頼上昇後会話2
CN_008.text: 作り上げられた夢なんて、不思議ですね。未来のドクター、僕はどうあなたと接したらいいのでしょうか。もし僕たちがもっと早く出会っていたら――いいえ。ドクターは、あなたと私の間のどの地点にも存在しないのですよ。あの方は私の今に属しています。あの方には自由に行動させるべきです。私は非常に期待しているのですよ。

CN_009.title: 信頼上昇後会話3
CN_009.text: 一人のヴイーヴルと、あの「ドクター」。彼らの慈悲を求めているのですか？いいえ。私は、自らを導く預言者の出現を、あるいは私自身が他者の預言者になることだけを望んでいます。病による苦痛よりも、とこしなえに続く虚無の方がはるかに呵責であるのです……聞いてください、エリオット。私は少し疲れました。

CN_010.title: 放置
CN_010.text: ……眠りなさい、私のエリオット。眠りにつけば、私たちは同じ夢にたゆたうことになるでしょう。あなたが私になる夢に包まれ、私がまだあなたである夢に沈むのです。

CN_011.title: 入職会話
CN_011.text: 私は在りし日の運命を紐解いたのでしょうか？いえ、これはただの夢です。あなたが避けてやまなかった夢ですよ、僕の未来。

CN_012.title: 経験値上昇
CN_012.text: どうもよく謀が目に入って……ええ、そうですよ、エリオット。それだけでなく、争いや、物質主義も。あれらは遍在するのですよ。

CN_013.title: 昇進Ⅰ
CN_013.text: 鉱石病に削り落とされた私の未来は幾ばくも残っていません。ロドスには是非とも機を逸さず利用してもらいたいものです。それは無理でしょう。あなたの自己破滅的願望を満足させることができる人は、ロドスにはいません。彼らが優しすぎるのではなく、あなたが厳しすぎるのです。これがエリオット・グラバーの判断です。

CN_014.title: 昇進Ⅱ
CN_014.text: 瞼を開いた時、あなたの瞳にサルゴンの冬は映りますか？不変の盛夏に眠入るのですか？僕はあなたにならなければいけませんか？予言は運命の仮の姿に他なりません。安らかに眠りなさい、エリオット。あなたが私を形づくり、私があなたを意味のあるものとしましょう。予言に語られない時が来たるまでは。

CN_017.title: 編成
CN_017.text: どうしてもっとたくさんの仲間を入れないんですか？その方が効率が良いのに。そのうち分かりますよ。多くと出遭うにつれ理解することになります。

CN_018.title: 隊長任命
CN_018.text: エリオットならきっと私に問うでしょう。「空っぽの魂が、どうやって人を真摯に導いていくんですか？」と。

CN_019.title: 作戦準備
CN_019.text: 重傷の先生を背負（しょ）っていた時に得た背中の感触はいまだに記憶から消えてはいません。あれは戦争の感触です。けれども、戦争は利を図るには都合がいいのです。

CN_020.title: 戦闘開始
CN_020.text: かつて、私の戦いはすべて一つの目的のためにありました。その目的を失った今、争いは過去に返しましょう。

CN_021.title: 選択時1
CN_021.text: 演習であると思えばよいのです。

CN_022.title: 選択時2
CN_022.text: 流砂の感触を覚えていますか？

CN_023.title: 配置1
CN_023.text: 私の戦争兵器は、必ずやあなた様の望みを満たすでしょう。

CN_024.title: 配置2
CN_024.text: しかして「人」こそが最後の兵器なのです。

CN_025.title: 作戦中1
CN_025.text: これらの兵器がいかにして誕生したかは記憶に留まったままです。

CN_026.title: 作戦中2
CN_026.text: 恩師の名でもって戦うことで、何を得られるというのでしょうか？

CN_027.title: 作戦中3
CN_027.text: 感情は勝利をもたらすことはありません。

CN_028.title: 作戦中4
CN_028.text: 復讐はもう終わったのです。

CN_029.title: 高難度作戦クリア
CN_029.text: 闇市の冬に雪は降りません。また雪を見られるでしょうか。きっと機会はあるでしょう。けれども、その銀白の世界に、あなたが慣れ親しんできたものは何もありません。

CN_030.title: ★3で戦闘終了
CN_030.text: あなたの策略は人々の上をいきます。そうやって闇市の主になったのですか？ええ、あなたもそうなりますよ、エリオット。私にはよく分かっています。あなたは誰一人逃しはしません。

CN_031.title: ★2以下戦闘終了
CN_031.text: 罪ある者たちが逃げる様をご覧になりましたか？はい。あのクルビア人たちも、同じような目で僕を見ていたのでしょうか。

CN_032.title: 作戦失敗
CN_032.text: 失敗が許された時間は過ぎ去り、戻ってはきません。私たちは、あまりに強大な敵に立ち向かっているのです。運命？いいえ、僕たち自身です。

CN_033.title: 基地配属
CN_033.text: ロドスにいると安心できるんですか？カフェインのおかげですよ。

CN_034.title: タッチ1
CN_034.text: 彼を起こさないように、気をつけていただけますか？

CN_036.title: 信頼タッチ
CN_036.text: 思い出を大事に扱いなさい。まだ感情が容易く揺れ動く時間を大切になさい。分かっています。少なくとも僕はまだ理解できます。

CN_042.title: 挨拶
CN_042.text: 旧きを送り、新しきを迎える時に、闇市の主のご機嫌を取りに来る人は多いのでしょう？どうでしょう。もう忘れてしまいました。覚えているのはあの冬、先生に連れられて科学技術館を見学したことだけです。入館料は無料で……あまりに遠くなりました、よもやあの記憶がこれほどに遠いものになろうとは。

CN_001.title: 어시스턴트 임명
CN_001.text: 비밀에 싸인 암시장의 주인이여, 당신은 시간 속에서 무엇을 찾으셨나요? 과거입니다, 엘리엇. 저는 끊임없이 과거를 찾고 있습니다. 어쩌면 저는, 선인장과 흩날리는 모래 속에서 종착점을 맞이하게 될지도 모릅니다. 하지만 운명이 가져올 답은 당신도 저도 알 수는 없을 것 같군요.

CN_002.title: 대화 1
CN_002.text: 전 그곳의 모든 것을 증오합니다. 아무리 그 금화를 따르는 것이 운명에 타협하는 일이라고는 해도, 전 사르곤을 떠날 수밖에 없었습니다. 하지만 전 아직 이곳에 있답니다, 샌드솔저. 당신 자신의 모든 걸 버리는 것은 불가능해요. 운명이라는 말은, 저와 당신 사이에서는 바꿀 수 없는 것이나 마찬가지니까요.

CN_003.title: 대화 2
CN_003.text: 사르곤은 당신의 몸에 흉터를 남길 겁니다. 고용주의 눈에 당신은 그저 불쌍하고 연약한 파울비스트처럼 보이겠죠. 전 채찍질의 고통은 잊어버렸습니다만, 당신은 그들을 원망하고 있나요? 아뇨, 당신의 눈을 통해서 그들의 최후를 알게 되었으니까요. 다행히도, 당신은 후회하지 않는 모양이네요.

CN_004.title: 대화 3
CN_004.text: 하지만 당신의 표정에선 아무런 답도 찾을 수 없군요. 당신이 그 모든 걸 불태워 버리지 않았었나요? 암시장에는 하늘을 바라볼 수 있는 광장이 있었죠. 당신은 그 밤하늘을 보며 무엇을 떠올렸는지 기억하십니까? 전 그것을 화장이라 칭했지만, 계획대로 맹렬한 불꽃이 제 앞에 타오르기 시작했을 때에 떠오른 것은 은사님의 얼굴이 아니었습니다.

CN_005.title: 1차 정예화 후 대화
CN_005.text: '쏜의 선물'. 그 첫 번째 부품이 무엇이었는지 기억하십니까? 황사 아래에 양심을 묻고, 마침 아들을 잃은 간수를 속여내 얻은 질 나쁜 아츠 유닛을 말하는 건가요? 게다가…… '쏜의 선물'이라니, 교수님께서 음모가에게 뭔가를 주기라도 했다는 건가요, 패신저?

CN_006.title: 2차 정예화 후 대화
CN_006.text: 알려 주세요, 광석병은 우리의 생활을 바꾸었나요? 당신은 고통을 느끼고 있나요? 또, 그 병은 절 어떻게 바꾸어 놓은 거죠? 배후에 있었던 음모가들의 계획은 실패로 끝났을까요? 떨고 있군요, 불쌍한 엘리엇. 그런 건 전부 잊어버리세요. 지금의 전, 그저 거울 앞에서 그것의 아름다움에 넋을 잃을 뿐이랍니다.

CN_007.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 1
CN_007.text: 봄은 장사하기 좋은 계절입니다. 여름엔 다양한 행사가 열리고, 가을엔 이버트를 떠나 이익을 취할 수 있으며, 겨울엔 전쟁이 찾아오죠. 이게 바로 사르곤의 사계절입니다. 아마 당신도, 앞으로 이 사계절을 뼈저리게 증오하게 될 겁니다. 하지만…… 이버트의 여름밤엔, 별들이 잘 보이는걸요.

CN_008.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 2
CN_008.text: 만들어진 꿈이라니, 신기하네요. 미래의 박사님. 전 당신을 어떻게 대해야 할까요? 만약 우리가 더 일찍 만났더라면…… 아뇨, 박사님께선 당신과 저 사이, 그 어떤 곳에도 존재하지 않습니다. 박사님은 제가 속한 현재에 계시니, 더 자유롭게 행동하실 필요가 있습니다. 상당히 기대가 되는군요.

CN_009.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 3
CN_009.text: 한 명의 와이번과 그 '박사님'. 당신은 혹시, 그들의 연민을 구하고 있는 건가요? 아뇨, 저는 저를 이끌 예언자가 등장하거나, 저 자신이 다른 이의 예언자가 되기만을 기다리고 있습니다. 병으로 인한 고통보다 기나긴 허무함이 더욱 고통스러운 법이죠…… 엘리엇. 전 조금 지쳤답니다.

CN_010.title: 방치
CN_010.text: ……주무세요, 나의 엘리엇. 잠이 들면 우린 같은 꿈을 꾸게 될 겁니다. 당신은 내가 되고, 저는 아직 당신인 꿈을 말이죠.

CN_011.title: 오퍼레이터 입사
CN_011.text: 저는 지난날의 운명을 파헤친 걸까요? 아뇨, 이건 단지 꿈일 뿐이에요. 당신이 피하려고 했던 그 꿈이랍니다, 나의 미래여.

CN_012.title: 작전기록 학습
CN_012.text: 전 여러 음모들과 자주 마주하게 되는 편인 것 같네요…… 그래요, 엘리엇. 분쟁과 물욕들 또한 마찬가지로 자주 마주하게 될 겁니다. 그것들은 어디에나 존재하거든요.

CN_013.title: 1차 정예화 (승진)
CN_013.text: 광석병으로 인해, 제 미래는 얼마 남지 않았습니다. 부디 로도스 아일랜드가 제 가치를 최대한 이용해 주었으면 하는군요. 그건 어려울 것 같네요. 로도스 아일랜드에는 당신의 자멸 욕구를 만족시켜 줄 사람은 없을 테니까요. 그들이 자비로워서가 아니라, 당신이 너무 엄격하기 때문이에요. 이것이 엘리엇 글로버의 판단입니다.

CN_014.title: 2차 정예화 (승진)
CN_014.text: 눈을 떴을 때, 당신은 사르곤의 겨울을 보게 될까요? 아니면 영원한 여름 속에서 잠들어 있을까요? 저는 당신이 될 수밖에 없는 운명인 건가요? 예언은 단지 운명의 위장일 뿐입니다. 그러니 안심하고 잠에 드세요, 엘리엇. 당신이 나를 만들었고, 나는 당신의 존재를 의미 있게 하죠. 예언이 언급하지 않은 그때가 오기 전까지는 말이에요.

CN_017.title: 팀 배치
CN_017.text: 왜 더 많은 동료들을 데려오지 않는 건가요? 이건 효율적이지 않아요. 당신도 조만간 알게 될 겁니다, 앞으로 더 많은 일들을 이해하게 되겠지요.

CN_018.title: 팀장 임명
CN_018.text: 엘리엇이라면 분명 제게 이렇게 물었을 겁니다. “공허한 영혼이 어떻게 다른 이들을 이끌 수 있다는 거죠?”

CN_019.title: 작전 출발
CN_019.text: 전 아직도 중상을 입은 교수님을 업었을 때, 등에서 느껴졌던 감각을 잊지 못하고 있습니다. 그건 전쟁의 감각이었죠. 하지만 전쟁에서도 취할 수 있는 이익이 존재한다는 점은 의심하지 않습니다.

CN_020.title: 작전 개시
CN_020.text: 제가 그동안 겪어 왔던 전투들은, 모두 한 가지 목표만을 위한 것이었습니다. 그 목표를 잃은 지금, 싸움은 과거에게 돌려주도록 하죠.

CN_023.title: 배치 1
CN_023.text: 제 전쟁 병기라면, 분명 당신의 뜻을 이룰 수 있을 겁니다.

CN_024.title: 배치 2
CN_024.text: 결국 사람이 최후의 병기인 셈이죠.

CN_025.title: 작전 중 1
CN_025.text: 이 장비들이 어떻게 탄생했었는지, 아직도 기억이 나는군요.

CN_026.title: 작전 중 2
CN_026.text: 은사님의 이름으로 싸운다 한들, 대체 무엇을 얻을 수 있다는 겁니까?

CN_027.title: 작전 중 3
CN_027.text: 감정으론 승리를 쟁취할 수 없습니다.

CN_028.title: 작전 중 4
CN_028.text: 복수는 이미 끝났습니다.

CN_029.title: 고난이도 작전 종료
CN_029.text: 암시장의 겨울엔 눈이 내리지 않아요. 저도 언젠가 눈을 볼 수 있을까요? 네. 하지만 그 백색의 땅 위엔, 당신에게 익숙한 그 무엇도 남아 있지 않을 겁니다.

CN_030.title: 3★ 작전 종료
CN_030.text: 당신의 계략은 모든 이들을 능가했어요, 이런 방식으로 암시장의 주인이 된 건가요? 네. 그리고 당신도 그리될 것이랍니다, 엘리엇. 전 아주 잘 알고 있어요. 당신은 그 누구 하나 놓치지 않을 겁니다.

CN_031.title: 비 3★ 작전 종료
CN_031.text: 벌을 받아야 마땅한 자들이 도망치는 모습을 보셨습니까? 네. 그 컬럼비아 사람들도 절 저런 눈으로 바라보고 있었을까요?

CN_032.title: 작전 실패
CN_032.text: 실패가 허용되는 시간은, 한번 지나가면 되돌아오지 않죠. 우린 지금 막강한 적에 맞서고 있습니다. 운명? 아뇨, 우리 자신이겠죠.

CN_033.title: 시설에 배치
CN_033.text: 로도스 아일랜드에 있으면, 안심이 되나요? 아마 카페인 덕분일 겁니다.

CN_036.title: 신뢰도 터치
CN_036.text: 추억을 소중히 여기세요. 그리고 아직 감정이 풍부하게 남아 있는 그 시기를, 소중히 여기길 바랍니다. 알고 있어요. 적어도 전, 아직 이해할 수 있으니까요.

CN_042.title: 인사
CN_042.text: 꿈속에서 어떤 미래를 보았습니다. 사계절이 바뀌는 풍경 속에서 모든 것이 무로 돌아가고, 악몽도 아름다운 꿈조차 없이 그저 어둠만이 남게 되었지요. 그게 바로 운명의 답이에요, 엘리엇. 어둠은 그 무엇도 의미하지 않습니다. 단지…… 공허 그 자체일 뿐이랍니다.

CN_001.title: 任命助理
CN_001.text: 凯尔希医生跟我说过，如果博士选择把我安置在身边，那么就意味着博士决定要保护我。但看样子，博士也还不太明白是什么意思？不过我感觉得出来，她有她这么说的把握。

CN_002.title: 交谈1
CN_002.text: 美食、漫画、游戏，以及创造了它们的人们，都是散落在星空下的诗篇。而我的旅途就是品遍它们——还有处理掉可能对这一切造成妨害的东西。

CN_003.title: 交谈2
CN_003.text: 啊，博士，你来得正好，快尝尝看，我这采用了最能保留食材营养和生命力的独家秘诀做出来的特色刺身料理！

CN_004.title: 交谈3
CN_004.text: 这个吗？是东国早些年的经典游戏哦，虽说现在已经不太流行了。博士要试试看吗？来，操纵那个黄色的嘴去吃东西就行。不过在吸收到足够的营养、获得足够的力量之前，都只会被别人当作猎物呢。

CN_005.title: 晋升后交谈1
CN_005.text: 正义感？博士误会啦。我自己对坏人其实是无所谓的，但出于种种理由大家往往不能把坏人怎么样吧？这种时候如果能让坏人消失......也不会有人感到困扰，只会觉得松了口气吧？

CN_006.title: 晋升后交谈2
CN_006.text: 虽然还是不太明白博士讲的道理，但是总之，只处理掉博士认证过是坏人的家伙就没问题了吧？因为博士是好人呀。如果博士其实是坏人的话？不要吧，那我会很困扰啊。我，总不能......

CN_007.title: 信赖提升后交谈1
CN_007.text: 有时会感到舰船内好像有什么......熟悉的，又有些陌生......亲切，又好像充满敌意的气息。博士，我有些不安......

CN_008.title: 信赖提升后交谈2
CN_008.text: 博士觉得，把别人的生命掌握在自己手中时是什么样的感觉呢？如果换作我的话会感到很温暖，甚至忍不住为此有些颤抖......嗯？我是指博士在作为指挥官，握持着大家生命线时的感想。

CN_009.title: 信赖提升后交谈3
CN_009.text: 我有时候会想，既然是我们吃下去的食物和汲取的营养造就了我们，那么如果我们吃下了同样的东西，做着同样的事情，我们就会渐渐变得一样吗？博士，我们......能吗？

CN_010.title: 闲置
CN_010.text: 是该休息一下啦，博士。来来，睡这边，我去拿毯子。

CN_011.title: 干员报到
CN_011.text: 啊，博士你好，凯尔希医生说从今天开始我就正式纳入博士的指挥啦！虽然可惜依旧不能算正式干员的样子，不过只要是博士找我帮忙，我一定会尽力的。

CN_012.title: 观看作战记录
CN_012.text: 要吸收和消化掉这些对吧，我会努力的。

CN_013.title: 精英化晋升1
CN_013.text: 我被认可了？之后是不是就可以跟博士去更多不同的地方解决坏人？

CN_014.title: 精英化晋升2
CN_014.text: 曾经也是一个下着雨的日子，我得到了一些预想之外的、改变了我的馈赠，但那个人并没有教我该怎么面对将来的事。博士，如果是你的话会亲自指导我吗？

CN_017.title: 编入队伍
CN_017.text: 不要暴露在大家面前比较好，哪怕是队友？嗯，我听博士的。

CN_018.title: 任命队长
CN_018.text: 我会暗中保护好博士的，还有参与作战的大家。

CN_019.title: 行动出发
CN_019.text: 本次作战的部署计划和隐秘任务......嗯，确认无误。

CN_020.title: 行动开始
CN_020.text: 敌人吗，看上去还不赖嘛。

CN_021.title: 选中干员1
CN_021.text: 博士的指示就是我的道标。

CN_023.title: 部署1
CN_023.text: 博士总能帮我找到自己的位置呢。

CN_024.title: 部署2
CN_024.text: 放心大胆地布置战术吧。

CN_025.title: 作战中1
CN_025.text: 小菜一碟。

CN_027.title: 作战中3
CN_027.text: 你什么时候产生了这些附肢只是幻象的错觉？

CN_028.title: 作战中4
CN_028.text: 总得有人，也总会有人来处理掉恶徒呢。

CN_029.title: 完成高难行动
CN_029.text: 真是难啃的骨头，我需要花点时间消化这次的作战呢。

CN_030.title: 3星结束行动
CN_030.text: 这下坏人的数量又减少了呢，都是多亏了博士！

CN_031.title: 非3星结束行动
CN_031.text: 嗯？博士怎么放跑了几个坏人？我去替博士收拾一下吧。

CN_032.title: 行动失败
CN_032.text: 如果是要掩护大家撤离的话我还有办法......不，光是救人的话是不够的，只有在这里把坏人全都......

CN_033.title: 进驻设施
CN_033.text: 我来给大家做点好吃的放松下吧？

CN_036.title: 信赖触摸
CN_036.text: 啊嚏！唔......怎么有一种想法被人看穿了的感觉......

CN_042.title: 问候
CN_042.text: 想我了没有，博士？

CN_001.title: Appointed as Assistant
CN_001.text: Dr. Kal'tsit told me if you ever chose to place me at your side, it means you've decided to protect me. From the looks of things though, Doctor, I don't think you understand what that means? But I know she must've said it for a reason.

CN_002.title: Talk 1
CN_002.text: Fine dining, comics, games, and the people who created them, are all psalms laid out beneath the starry firmament. And my journey is to taste them all— and to eliminate anything that seeks to threaten them.

CN_003.title: Talk 2
CN_003.text: Ah, Doctor, you came at just the right time. Quick, come have a taste, I prepared this special sashimi dish using a special technique that best preserves the nutrients and vitality of the ingredients!

CN_004.title: Talk 3
CN_004.text: This one, huh? It's a classic arcade game from Higashi, though it's kind of niche now. Want to give it a try, Doctor? Here, you move that yellow mouth around and try to eat as much stuff as you can. But until you've absorbed enough nutrients to become strong, you'll only be prey to others.

CN_005.title: Talk after Promotion 1
CN_005.text: A strong sense of justice? You have the wrong idea, Doctor. I'm personally not that concerned about bad guys, but for various reasons, the people here usually can't do much to them, right? In times like that, if there was some way to make those bad guys disappear... Nobody would lose sleep over that, right? It'd be a breath of fresh air, right?

CN_006.title: Talk after Promotion 2
CN_006.text: Though I don't really understand your rationale, Doctor, what you're basically saying is, only eliminate the people who you've designated as bad guys, right? Because you're a good person, Doctor. What if you were actually a bad guy? Don't say that, that'd be quite troublesome. There's no way I could...

CN_007.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
CN_007.text: Sometimes, it feels like there's something on this ship... Familiar, yet also foreign. Gentle, yet also seemingly full of hostility. Doctor, it makes me rather uneasy...

CN_008.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
CN_008.text: Doctor, what does it feel like to take charge of the lives of so many others with your own hands? If I was in your position, I'd feel very warm, maybe wouldn't even be able to resist trembling... Huh? I was talking about you as a commander, holding on to everyone's lifeline.

CN_009.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
CN_009.text: I sometimes think, since the food we eat and the nutrients we absorb become a part of us, if we were to eat the same things and do the same things, would we gradually become the same? Doctor... can we?

CN_010.title: Idle
CN_010.text: It's time to take a little break, Doctor. Come here, lie down. I'll go grab a blanket.

CN_011.title: Onboard
CN_011.text: Ah, hello there, Doctor. Dr. Kal'tsit tells me you're my commander from today on! It's too bad I don't count as an official operator, but as long as you need my help, I'll do whatever I can.

CN_012.title: Watching Battle Record
CN_012.text: I need to absorb and digest all this, right? I'll do my best.

CN_013.title: Promotion 1
CN_013.text: I got the nod? Does that mean I can go with you to more places and take care of more bad guys?

CN_014.title: Promotion 2
CN_014.text: On one rainy day, I received an unexpected gift that changed me, but I was not taught how to face the future. Doctor, if it were you, would you have shown me the path yourself?

CN_017.title: Added to Squad
CN_017.text: It'd be best to not expose myself to others, even my teammates? Mm, I'll do as you say, Doctor.

CN_018.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
CN_018.text: I will protect you from the shadows, Doctor, as well as everyone else participating in the operation.

CN_019.title: Depart
CN_019.text: The deployment plan and secret missions for this operation... Yes, flawless indeed.

CN_020.title: Begin Operation
CN_020.text: The enemies, huh. They don't look half bad.

CN_023.title: Deployment 1
CN_023.text: You always help me find my place.

CN_024.title: Deployment 2
CN_024.text: Weave the tapestry of your tactics boldly and without worry.

CN_025.title: In Battle 1
CN_025.text: A piece of cake.

CN_027.title: In Battle 3
CN_027.text: When did you delude yourself into thinking that these tentacles are mere illusions?

CN_028.title: In Battle 4
CN_028.text: Where there are people, there must be someone to cull the evildoers among them.

CN_029.title: 4-star Result
CN_029.text: What a tough nut to crack. It'll take some time to digest this battle.

CN_030.title: 3-star Result
CN_030.text: There are fewer bad guys out there now, and it's all thanks to you, Doctor!

CN_031.title: Sub 3-star Result
CN_031.text: Hm? Doctor, why'd you let some bad guys through? I'll go clean them up for you.

CN_032.title: Operation Failure
CN_032.text: If you want to cover everyone as they evacuate, I still have an idea... No, just saving everyone isn't good enough. Only by eliminating all the bad guys here...

CN_033.title: Assigned to Facility
CN_033.text: Shall I whip up something tasty to help everyone unwind?

CN_036.title: Trust Tap
CN_036.text: Achoo! Ugh... Why does it feel like someone's looking right through me...

CN_042.title: Greeting
CN_042.text: Did you miss me, Doctor?

CN_001.title: 秘書任命
CN_001.text: ケルシー先生が言ってたよ。ドクターが僕を側に置くようになったら、それは僕を守ることを決めたんだって。でもドクター自身は、それが何を意味するか理解してないみたいだね。だけど僕にはわかるんだ、ケルシー先生は適当を言ってるわけじゃないってね。

CN_002.title: 会話1
CN_002.text: グルメ、マンガ、ゲーム、そしてそれを創り出す人たち、みーんな星空の下に散らばる詩なんだ。僕の旅の目的は、そういうものを全部味わうこと――そして、それを邪魔するものを片付けることだよ。

CN_003.title: 会話2
CN_003.text: あ、ドクター、ちょうどいいところに来た。これ食べてみて、食材の栄養と生命力を最大限キープできる極秘の調理法で作った刺し身料理だよ！

CN_004.title: 会話3
CN_004.text: これ？極東で流行ってたレトロゲームだよ、今はもうあんまり人気ないけどね。ドクターもやってみる？あの黄色い顔を、周りのものを食べるように操作するんだ。でもたくさん栄養を摂ってパワーアップするまでは、他の敵から獲物として狙われちゃうんだ。

CN_005.title: 昇進後会話1
CN_005.text: 正義感？いや、ドクターは誤解してるよ。僕は別に悪人をなんとも思ってないよ。でもみんなは、色々事情があって悪人に手を焼かされてるんでしょ？そんな時に悪人を消してあげれば……誰も困らないし、みんなホッとするでしょ？

CN_006.title: 昇進後会話2
CN_006.text: ドクターの理屈はよくわからないけど、とにかくドクターが悪人って判定した奴だけ片付ければいいんでしょ？だってドクターは良い人だから。もしドクターが実は悪人だったらどうするか？やめてよ、そんなの困るんだ。だってそしたら、僕はドクターを……

CN_007.title: 信頼上昇後会話1
CN_007.text: 時々感じるんだ。この艦内には……懐かしくて、でもどこか馴染みのない……優しくて、でも敵意に満ちた何かがあるって。ドクター、僕、ちょっと不安だよ……

CN_008.title: 信頼上昇後会話2
CN_008.text: ドクター、人の命を握ってる時ってどんな気分？もし僕なら、すごくあったかく感じて、それで身体が震えちゃうと思う……えっ？いやいや、ドクターが指揮官としてみんなの命を預かってる時の感想を聞いてるだけだよ。

CN_009.title: 信頼上昇後会話3
CN_009.text: たまに思うけど、呑み込んだ食べ物と吸収した栄養が僕たちを造り上げたんなら、もし同じものを食べて、同じことをしてたら、どんどん同じになっていくのかなって。ドクター、僕たちに……できるかな？

CN_010.title: 放置
CN_010.text: ちょっと休んだ方がいいよ、ドクター。ほら来て、ここで寝てて。僕が毛布を取ってくるから。

CN_011.title: 入職会話
CN_011.text: あ、ドクターこんにちは。ケルシー先生が、今日から僕はドクターの配下になるって言ってたよ！相変わらず正式なオペレーターとしては認められないみたいだけど、ドクターが手伝ってほしいことがあれば、何でも力になるからね。

CN_012.title: 経験値上昇
CN_012.text: これを吸い込んで消化すればいいんでしょ。頑張るよ。

CN_013.title: 昇進Ⅰ
CN_013.text: 僕が認められたの？これからはドクターともっと色んな場所に行って、悪人を片付けていいってこと？

CN_014.title: 昇進Ⅱ
CN_014.text: あの時もこんな雨の日だったなぁ。予想外の贈り物を受け取って、僕は変わったんだ。でもあの人はこれからの将来とどうやって向き合えばいいか教えてくれなかった。ドクター、君なら手を取って僕に教えてくれる？

CN_017.title: 編成
CN_017.text: チームメイト同士でも、みんなの前に出ない方がいい？わかった、ドクターの言う通りにするよ。

CN_018.title: 隊長任命
CN_018.text: ドクターのことも、作戦に参加するみんなのことも、陰から守るよ。

CN_019.title: 作戦準備
CN_019.text: 今回の作戦計画と秘密任務は、っと……うん、間違いなし。

CN_020.title: 戦闘開始
CN_020.text: あれが敵？なかなかうまそうに見えるね。

CN_021.title: 選択時1
CN_021.text: ドクターの指示が僕の道標だよ。

CN_023.title: 配置1
CN_023.text: ドクターはいつだって僕の居場所を見つけてくれるんだ。

CN_024.title: 配置2
CN_024.text: 思うがままの戦術でいいよ。

CN_025.title: 作戦中1
CN_025.text: 前菜代わりにもならないね。

CN_027.title: 作戦中3
CN_027.text: 一体いつから、この触手はまやかしに過ぎないって錯覚してたの？

CN_028.title: 作戦中4
CN_028.text: 悪徒は討たれるべきだし、その執行人は必ず現れる。

CN_029.title: 高難度作戦クリア
CN_029.text: なんて手強い連中なんだろう。今回の作戦を消化するのには時間がかかりそう。

CN_030.title: ★3で戦闘終了
CN_030.text: また悪人の数を減らせたね。全部ドクターのおかげだよ！

CN_031.title: ★2以下戦闘終了
CN_031.text: あれ？ドクター、何人か逃がしてるよ？僕が代わりに片付けてくるね。

CN_032.title: 作戦失敗
CN_032.text: みんなの撤退を援護するなら手はあるよ……いや、援護するだけじゃダメだ、ここで悪人を全員始末しないと……

CN_033.title: 基地配属
CN_033.text: 何か美味しいものでも作って、みんなにリラックスしてもらうってのはどう？

CN_036.title: 信頼タッチ
CN_036.text: ハクションッ！うっ……誰かに見透かされてるような気がする……

CN_042.title: 挨拶
CN_042.text: ドクター、僕が恋しかった？

CN_001.title: 어시스턴트 임명
CN_001.text: 켈시 선생님이 그랬어. 박사가 나를 옆에 두게 되면, 그건 나를 지키기로 한 거라고. 하지만 박사 스스로는 그게 무엇을 의미하는지 이해하지 못한 모양이구나. 하지만 나는 알 수 있어. 켈시 선생님이 적당히 한 소리가 아니라는 걸.

CN_002.title: 대화 1
CN_002.text: 미식, 만화, 게임, 그리고 그걸 만들어내는 사람들, 다들 밤하늘 아래에 흩어진 시와 같아. 내 여행의 목적은 그런 걸 전부 맛보는 것…… 그리고 그걸 방해하는 것을 처리하는 거야.

CN_003.title: 대화 2
CN_003.text: 아, 박사, 마침 잘 왔어. 이거 먹어 봐. 재료의 영양과 생명력을 최대한 유지할 수 있는 극비 조리법으로 만든 회 요리야!

CN_004.title: 대화 3
CN_004.text: 이거? 극동에서 유행했던 고전 게임이야. 지금은 그다지 인기 없지만 말이지. 박사도 해 볼래? 이 노란 얼굴을, 주위에 있는 것들을 먹도록 조작하는 거야. 하지만 잔뜩 영양을 섭취해서 파워업할 때까지는 다른 적들이 사냥감으로 노리지.

CN_005.title: 1차 정예화 후 대화
CN_005.text: 정의감? 아니, 박사는 오해하고 있어. 나는 딱히 악인에 대해 아무 생각도 없어. 하지만 다들 여러 사정이 있어서 악인 때문에 애먹고 있잖아? 그럴 때에 악인을 없애 주면…… 아무도 난처할 것 없고, 다들 한시름 덜 거 아냐?

CN_006.title: 2차 정예화 후 대화
CN_006.text: 박사의 이치는 잘 모르겠지만, 아무튼 박사가 악인이라 판정한 녀석만 처리하면 되는 거잖아? 왜냐면 박사는 착한 사람이니까. 만일 박사가 사실은 악인이면 어쩔 거냐고? 그만해, 그런 건 곤란해. 왜냐면 만약 그러면, 나는 박사를……

CN_007.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 1
CN_007.text: 가끔씩 느껴. 이 함내에는…… 그립고, 하지만 왠지 낯선…… 상냥하고, 하지만 적의로 가득 찬 무언가가 있다는 걸. 박사, 나, 좀 불안해……

CN_008.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 2
CN_008.text: 박사, 사람의 목숨을 쥐고 있을 때란 어떤 기분이야? 만약 나라면, 굉장히 따뜻하게 느껴져서 몸이 떨릴 것 같아…… 응? 아니, 박사가 지휘관으로서 모두의 목숨을 책임질 때의 감상을 묻는 것뿐이야.

CN_009.title: 신뢰도 상승 후 대화 3
CN_009.text: 가끔 드는 생각인데, 삼킨 음식과 흡수한 영양분이 우리를 만들어낸 거라면, 만약 같은 걸 먹고 같은 일을 하면, 점점 비슷해지는 건가 싶어. 박사, 우리도…… 가능할까?

CN_010.title: 방치
CN_010.text: 좀 쉬는 게 좋겠어, 박사. 자, 이리 와. 여기서 자. 내가 담요 가져다줄 테니까.

CN_011.title: 오퍼레이터 입사
CN_011.text: 아, 박사, 안녕. 켈시 선생님이 오늘부터 나는 박사의 부하라고 했어! 여전히 정식 오퍼레이터로는 인정받지 못하는 모양이지만, 박사가 도움이 필요한 일이 있다면 내가 뭐든 힘이 되어 줄게.

CN_012.title: 작전기록 학습
CN_012.text: 이걸 빨아들여서 소화하면 되는 거지? 열심히 할게.

CN_013.title: 1차 정예화 (승진)
CN_013.text: 내가 인정받은 거야? 이제부터는 박사랑 더 다양한 장소에 가서, 악인을 처리해도 된다는 거지?

CN_014.title: 2차 정예화 (승진)
CN_014.text: 그때도 이렇게 비가 내리는 날이었는데. 예상 밖의 선물을 받고, 나는 변했어. 하지만 그 사람은 앞으로의 장래를 어떻게 마주해야 할지 알려주지 않았었지. 박사, 너라면 손을 잡고 내게 알려 줄 수 있어?

CN_017.title: 팀 배치
CN_017.text: 팀메이트끼리라도, 모두의 앞으로 안 나가는 게 좋다고? 알았어, 박사 말대로 할게.

CN_018.title: 팀장 임명
CN_018.text: 박사도, 작전에 참가하는 모두도, 그늘 속에서 지켜 줄게.

CN_019.title: 작전 출발
CN_019.text: 이번 작전 계획과 비밀 임무는…… 음, 문제없어.

CN_020.title: 작전 개시
CN_020.text: 저게 적인가? 제법 맛있게 생겼네.

CN_023.title: 배치 1
CN_023.text: 박사는 언제든 내가 있을 곳을 찾아 주는구나.

CN_024.title: 배치 2
CN_024.text: 생각한 그대로의 전술이면 돼.

CN_025.title: 작전 중 1
CN_025.text: 애피타이저 대신으로도 안 되겠네.

CN_027.title: 작전 중 3
CN_027.text: 대체 언제부터, 이 촉수는 속임수에 지나지 않는다고 착각한 거야?

CN_028.title: 작전 중 4
CN_028.text: 악당은 토벌당해야 마땅하고, 그 집행인은 반드시 나타나지.

CN_029.title: 고난이도 작전 종료
CN_029.text: 어쩜 이렇게 벅찬 녀석들인지. 이번 작전을 소화하기엔 시간이 걸릴 것 같아.

CN_030.title: 3★ 작전 종료
CN_030.text: 또 악인의 수를 줄였어. 전부 박사 덕분이야!

CN_031.title: 비 3★ 작전 종료
CN_031.text: 어라? 박사, 몇 명 놓쳤는데? 내가 대신 정리하고 올게.

CN_032.title: 작전 실패
CN_032.text: 모두의 퇴각을 엄호하는 거라면 방법은 있어…… 아니, 엄호하는 것만으로는 안 돼, 여기서 악인을 모두 처리해야 해……

CN_033.title: 시설에 배치
CN_033.text: 뭔가 맛있는 거라도 만들어서 모두가 릴랙스할 수 있게 하는 건 어때?

CN_036.title: 신뢰도 터치
CN_036.text: 에취! 으…… 누군가가 들여다보는 것 같은 느낌이야……

CN_042.title: 인사
CN_042.text: 박사, 내가 그리웠어?

CN_001.title: 任命助理
CN_001.text: 让你来担任我的“录武官”？罗德岛的待客之道，真是令人动容，难怪我那几个妹妹会喜欢这里......唔，误会？那，换我做你的副将也无妨。

CN_002.title: 交谈1
CN_002.text: “博士”，这个称呼让我想起打过交道的大炎学士，体察万千，见微知著。你我似是故人？那场混沌梦醒后，我确实去过许多地方......知交越多，越是寥落，可能在这点上，我们有些相似吧。

CN_003.title: 交谈2
CN_003.text: 如你所见，我时常记下来的，只是一些体悟，而非具体的武功招式。武道在“意”，受限于那些花哨的形式便再难突破。好比看不出夕画里的意境，非抓着她讨论笔力技法，免不了要吃闭门羹。

CN_004.title: 交谈3
CN_004.text: 我答应了给年的电影当“动作指导”，省得她太过闹腾，也省得她寂寞。夕胆小，令贪杯，我也会看着些......我们几个，虽然不比平常人家，但终究也是兄弟姐妹，而非所谓的“我们”。

CN_005.title: 晋升后交谈1
CN_005.text: 见死难，是征夫武人的日常。见死难仍动心忍性，不泯道义，而不是搪塞一句“世道如此”，才是他们的功课。世道千万年来都如此，只有那些庞大又傲慢的家伙，才会那样冷漠。

CN_006.title: 晋升后交谈2
CN_006.text: 天地偌大，风物几多，而人的气力和时间都有限，走不完，看不透，护不周全。对习武之人来说，能做的不过是春去秋来，从三九苦练到三伏，方法是笨了些，只在“无愧于心”“尽力而为”。

CN_007.title: 信赖提升后交谈1
CN_007.text: 那把剑是一样不可随意舍弃的“身外之物”，如今它在槐天裴手里，对各方来说都是能接受的结果。你问那场对决？他苦练四十年，赢了我一拳，而我又练了多少个春秋呢？算起来，输的反倒是我。

CN_008.title: 信赖提升后交谈2
CN_008.text: “我是谁”......临水自照，人也好，兽也罢，山峦林烟，天边双月的倒影，看见了什么，答案便是什么。至于人间换尽，我们兄弟姐妹会不会重归混沌，寻找新的答案，那又是另一个问题了。

CN_009.title: 信赖提升后交谈3
CN_009.text: 身在朝堂的求全求解，身在江湖的为仇为怨，为身份、为输赢，甚至只为了一个“说法”。执念太深，岁月又短，往往一个念想、一件事就贯穿了他们的一生。人哪，可怜可悲，可敬可叹！

CN_010.title: 闲置
CN_010.text: ......来去春景，怅然秋心。

CN_011.title: 干员报到
CN_011.text: 博士，有劳你照顾我那几个妹妹，接下来我也会在罗德岛叨扰一段时间。你称呼我“重岳”便好......是位故人取的名字。

CN_012.title: 观看作战记录
CN_012.text: 原上秋草，已经看不出本来的颜色。

CN_013.title: 精英化晋升1
CN_013.text: 我常常想起那些将士，从炎国各地来到玉门......百战白头，九死一生，终究不是为了战功。

CN_014.title: 精英化晋升2
CN_014.text: 博士，袍泽之情，生死之交，无需多言。

CN_017.title: 编入队伍
CN_017.text: 城头的烽火，总是这样熄了又燃。

CN_018.title: 任命队长
CN_018.text: 既然如此，博士，待会儿出发的时候，你可愿为我擂鼓？

CN_019.title: 行动出发
CN_019.text: 日落飞锦绣长河，天地壮我行色。

CN_020.title: 行动开始
CN_020.text: 征蓬未定，甲胄在身。

CN_023.title: 部署1
CN_023.text: 看看这眼前，风光无限，可惜作了战场。

CN_024.title: 部署2
CN_024.text: 多少迁客骚人，直到身临沙场，才能写出好句子，包括我那个妹妹......也算是一种际遇。

CN_025.title: 作战中1
CN_025.text: 形不成形，意不在意，再去练练吧。

CN_027.title: 作战中3
CN_027.text: 劲发江潮落，气收秋毫平！

CN_028.title: 作战中4
CN_028.text: 你们解决问题，还是只会仰仗干戈吗？

CN_029.title: 完成高难行动
CN_029.text: 从容落子，布局谋胜......博士，想不到你竟然也是个难得的棋手。

CN_030.title: 3星结束行动
CN_030.text: 征鼓一声千军动，掬罢黄沙浣铁衣......好一场大胜！

CN_031.title: 非3星结束行动
CN_031.text: 兵戈相向，伐谋利好，从来就没有真正的输赢，更难断真正的功过，无愧于心就好。

CN_032.title: 行动失败
CN_032.text: 胜败乃兵家常事，振作些。

CN_033.title: 进驻设施
CN_033.text: 这里比军帐舒适多了，耳边少了将士们操练的动静，会不会有一场好眠呢......

CN_034.title: 戳一下
CN_034.text: 博士，想到昨天那一招的拆解之法了？

CN_036.title: 信赖触摸
CN_036.text: 世殊事异，人变了，风物也在变。

CN_042.title: 问候
CN_042.text: 博士，今天的晨功又没看到你。

CN_001.title: 任命助理
CN_001.text: 让你来担任我的“录武官”？罗德岛的待客之道，真是让人动容，难怪我那几个妹妹会喜欢这里......么煞，搞错了？那，换我做你的副将也冒得问题。

CN_002.title: 交谈1
CN_002.text: “博士”，这个称呼让我想起了打过交道的大炎学士，体察万千，见微知著。你我像是故人？那场混沌梦醒后，我确实去过蛮多地方......知交越多，越是寂寥，可能在这一点上，我们有些相似吧。

CN_003.title: 交谈2
CN_003.text: 如你所见，我时常记下来的，只是一些体悟，而非具体的武功招式。武道在“意”，受限于那些花架子的形式就再难突破。好比看不出夕画里头的意境，非抓倒她讨论笔力技法，那非得吃闭门羹不可啊。

CN_004.title: 交谈3
CN_004.text: 我答应了给年的电影当“动作指导”，免得她瞎搞，也可以让她莫太寂寞。夕咧胆小，令咧贪杯，我也得罩倒一点......我们几个，虽然跟平常人家不一样，但终究也是兄弟姊妹，而非所谓的“我们”。

CN_005.title: 晋升后交谈1
CN_005.text: 见死难，是征夫武人的寻常。见死难还动心忍性，不泯道义，而不是敷衍一句“世道如此”，这才是他们的功课。世道千万年来都是如此，只有那些庞大又傲慢的家伙，才会那样冷漠。

CN_006.title: 晋升后交谈2
CN_006.text: 天地偌大，风物几多，而人的气力和时间都有限，走不完，看不透，护不周全。对习武的人来说，能做的不过是春去秋来，从三九苦练到三伏，方法是有点笨，只在“无愧于心”“尽力而为”。

CN_007.title: 信赖提升后交谈1
CN_007.text: 那把剑是一样不可随意舍弃的“身外之物”，如今它在槐天裴手里，对各方来说都是能接受的结果。你问那场对决？他苦练四十年，赢了我一拳，但我又练了几多个春秋呢？算下来，输的那一个反倒是我啊。

CN_008.title: 信赖提升后交谈2
CN_008.text: “我是谁”......临水自照，人也好，兽也罢，山峦林烟，天边双月的倒影，看到么事，答案就是么事。至于人间换尽，我们兄弟姊妹会不会重归混沌，寻找新的答案，那又是另一个问题了。

CN_009.title: 信赖提升后交谈3
CN_009.text: 身在朝堂的求全求解，身在江湖的为仇为怨，为身份、为输赢，甚至只为了一个“由头”。执念太深，寿命又短，往往一个念想、一件事就贯穿了他们的一生。人哪，可怜可悲，可敬可叹啊！

CN_010.title: 闲置
CN_010.text: ......来去春景，怅然秋心啊。

CN_011.title: 干员报到
CN_011.text: 博士，麻烦你照顾我那几个妹妹了，接下来我也会在罗德岛叨扰一段时间。你叫我“重岳”就好......是位故人给我起的名字。

CN_012.title: 观看作战记录
CN_012.text: 原上秋草，已经看不出本来的颜色了。

CN_013.title: 精英化晋升1
CN_013.text: 我总是想起那些将士，从炎国各地来到玉门......百战白头，九死一生，终究不是为了战功。

CN_014.title: 精英化晋升2
CN_014.text: 博士，袍泽之情，生死之交，无需多言。

CN_017.title: 编入队伍
CN_017.text: 城头的烽火，总是这样熄了又燃。

CN_018.title: 任命队长
CN_018.text: 既然如此，博士，等一下出发的时候，你愿不愿意为我擂鼓？

CN_019.title: 行动出发
CN_019.text: 日落飞锦绣长河，天地壮我行色。

CN_020.title: 行动开始
CN_020.text: 征蓬未定，甲胄在身。

CN_021.title: 选中干员1
CN_021.text: 三不之也要试一下拳脚。

CN_023.title: 部署1
CN_023.text: 看看这眼前，风光无限，可惜做了战场。

CN_024.title: 部署2
CN_024.text: 几多迁客骚人，直到身临沙场，才能写出好句子，包括我那个妹妹......这也算是一种际遇吧。

CN_025.title: 作战中1
CN_025.text: 形不成形，意不在意，再去练一练吧。

CN_027.title: 作战中3
CN_027.text: 劲发江潮落，气收秋毫平！

CN_028.title: 作战中4
CN_028.text: 你们解决问题，还是只会争强斗狠是吧？

CN_029.title: 完成高难行动
CN_029.text: 从容落子，布局谋胜......博士，冒想到你竟然也是个难得的棋手哇。

CN_030.title: 3星结束行动
CN_030.text: 征鼓一声千军动，掬罢黄沙浣铁衣......好一场大胜！

CN_031.title: 非3星结束行动
CN_031.text: 兵戈相向，伐谋利好，从来就冒得真正的输赢，更冒得办法判断真正的功过，无愧于心就好。

CN_032.title: 行动失败
CN_032.text: 胜败乃兵家常事，冒得关系。

CN_033.title: 进驻设施
CN_033.text: 这里比军帐舒服多了，冒得了将士们操练的声响，不晓得会不会睡个好觉咧......

CN_034.title: 戳一下
CN_034.text: 博士，昨天那一招的拆解之法想得么样了？

CN_036.title: 信赖触摸
CN_036.text: 世殊事异，人变了，风物也在变。

CN_042.title: 问候
CN_042.text: 博士，今天的晨功又冒看到你咧。

CN_001.title: Appointed as Assistant
CN_001.text: You would like to be my 'kung fu recorder?' The way Rhodes Island treats its guests truly moves me. It is no wonder my sisters love this place so much… I misunderstand?  No problem, I have no qualms with being your subordinate either.

CN_002.title: Talk 1
CN_002.text: Doctor.' Your title reminds me of the Yanese scholars. Experienced and knowledgeable, they see the forest for the trees. You feel like we've met before? It's true that after awakening from my dream of chaos, I have traveled to many places... Sadly, the more friends I make, the lonelier I feel. Perhaps we are alike in that respect.

CN_003.title: Talk 2
CN_003.text: As you can see, I note down only my experiences and insights, rather than any specific kung fu moves. What really matters to the martial arts is 'Yi' — your intent. If you let yourself be constrained by those gaudy forms, you will find it hard to break out of them. Take Dusk's paintings, for example. If I couldn't grasp the intent behind them, and sought to discuss techniques and styles with her, she would only shut the door on my face.

CN_004.title: Talk 3
CN_004.text: I agreed to be a 'fight choreographer' for Nian's movie. It keeps her from making too much of a racket, or getting too lonely. Dusk is timid, and Ling is too fond of drink. I will look after them as well... We are far from a normal family. Nevertheless, we are siblings, and not the collective 'we' as we are often called.

CN_005.title: Talk after Promotion 1
CN_005.text: Death is a daily occurrence to warriors on campaign. But the real challenge they face, is preserving their humanity and morality after facing such morbidity, rather growing jaded and desensitized. Indeed, conflicts and mortality have been the way of these lands for eons. But only those giant, terrible creatures are cold-hearted enough to think so.

CN_006.title: Talk after Promotion 2
CN_006.text: The world is a vast place, and wonderful sceneries abound, yet man has limited strength and time. It is impossible to see all these sights, much less defend them. To those who practice the martial arts, all we can do is train day and night, from the depths of winter to the height of summer. It may sound like a clumsy and brutish method, but the result is giving every last drop you have, leaving no regrets.

CN_007.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
CN_007.text: That sword is an unwanted possession that must not be cast away. Huai Tianpei keeping it is an outcome that all concerned parties can accept. My duel with him, you ask? He trained for forty years, and landed a single heavy blow on me. But how many comings and goings of spring and autumn have I trained? All things considered, I was the one who lost.

CN_008.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
CN_008.text: 'Who am I'... For this question, You need only gaze upon the water. Be it human, beast, mountains, foggy woods, or the reflection of the twin moons on the night sky, whatever it is you see, that is your answer. As for the distant, radically different future, whether we siblings will return to chaos and seek new answers, is an entirely different question.

CN_009.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
CN_009.text: The scholars at court seek perfect answers in everything. The kung fu practitioners who wander in jianghu seek revenge, status, glory, or a simple resolution. Their obsessions run deep, yet their time runs short. Often, they spend their whole lifetimes chasing a single ideal or undertaking... All those people, how woeful and pitiful, how respectable and regrettable.

CN_010.title: Idle
CN_010.text: The spring comes and goes, leaving a lonely autumn.

CN_011.title: Onboard
CN_011.text: Doctor, thank you kindly for taking care of my sisters. I hope you will excuse me for intruding upon Rhodes Island for a little while. Please call me 'Chongyue.' It's a name given to me by... an old friend of mine.

CN_012.title: Watching Battle Record
CN_012.text: The colors that once embellished the autumn grass, hues long buried by war.

CN_013.title: Promotion 1
CN_013.text: Often I think about those soldiers who traveled from all corners of Great Yan to Yumen. They risked their lives in battle until death took them, or their age crept upon themselves... yet never for their own ends.

CN_014.title: Promotion 2
CN_014.text: Battles we have fought, death we have braved. Doctor, no need to say more.

CN_017.title: Added to Squad
CN_017.text: Lit, quenched, then lit again… The signal fires never ever rest.

CN_018.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
CN_018.text: In that case, Doctor, will you beat the drums for me as we sortie?

CN_019.title: Depart
CN_019.text: The sunset weaves a silken river. Heaven and earth bolster me upon departure.

CN_020.title: Begin Operation
CN_020.text: Warriors from afar rest scarce, the armor they wear spurs them to march.

CN_021.title: Selecting Operator 1
CN_021.text: One should spar from time to time.

CN_023.title: Deployment 1
CN_023.text: Look at this spectacular sight. Alas, it is now a battlefield.

CN_024.title: Deployment 2
CN_024.text: Many intellectuals must join a battle before penning a decent verse, including that sister of mine… This too is an opportunity.

CN_025.title: In Battle 1
CN_025.text: Unsteady posture, wavering intent. Much to learn yet.

CN_026.title: In Battle 2
CN_026.text: A thousand moves in one breath!

CN_027.title: In Battle 3
CN_027.text: Strike, and sunder the tides cleft. Retract, and leave no peace bereft.

CN_028.title: In Battle 4
CN_028.text: After all this time, you still turn to war for solutions!

CN_029.title: 4-star Result
CN_029.text: You calmly place your pieces to plot your victory... Doctor, a weiqi player like you is a truly rare sight.

CN_030.title: 3-star Result
CN_030.text: A thousand armies move at the beating of your war drums, with a handful of sand to clean the blood from one's armor... What a tremendous victory!

CN_031.title: Sub 3-star Result
CN_031.text: There is never a true victory in brandishing a sword and formulating a strategy, while looking for gains and losses is an even greater folly. So long as you leave no regrets, then all is well.

CN_032.title: Operation Failure
CN_032.text: All warriors must face defeat. Don't lose heart.

CN_033.title: Assigned to Facility
CN_033.text: This is much more comfortable than a military tent. Can I even manage a good night's sleep without the sound of drilling soldiers…?

CN_034.title: Tap
CN_034.text: Doctor, have you figured out how to counter that move from yesterday?

CN_036.title: Trust Tap
CN_036.text: The times are changing, and man along with them. So too does the scenery change.

CN_042.title: Greeting
CN_042.text: Doctor, I did not see you at this morning's training session.

CN_001.title: Appointed as Assistant
CN_001.text: You would like to be my 'kung fu recorder?' The way Rhodes Island treats its guests truly moves me. It is no wonder my sisters love this place so much... Hm, I misunderstand? In that case, I have no qualms with being your subordinate either.

CN_002.title: Talk 1
CN_002.text: 'Doctor.' Your title reminds me of a Yanese scholar with whom I once crossed paths. One with excellent observation skills who sees the forest for the trees. We seem like old friends, you say? It is true that after awakening from my dream of chaos, I have traveled to many places... The more friends I make, the lonelier I become. Perhaps we are alike in that respect.

CN_003.title: Talk 2
CN_003.text: As you can see, I memorize only my experiences rather than any specific kung fu moves. What matters the most to the martial arts is your intent. If you let yourself be constrained by those gaudy forms, you will find it hard to break out of them. Take for example the emotions conveyed by Dusk's paintings. If you were to discuss techniques and styles with her, you would only be inviting her to shut you out of the door.

CN_004.title: Talk 3
CN_004.text: I agreed to be a 'stunt coordinator' for Nian's movie. It keeps her from making too much of a racket and from getting too lonely. Dusk is fearful, and Ling is too fond of drinking. Naturally, I keep an eye on them as well... We may not be normal, but nonetheless we are siblings, and not the 'us' that we are often called.

CN_005.title: Talk after Promotion 1
CN_005.text: Death is a daily occurrence to warriors on campaign. Rather than shrugging death off as a natural turn of events, maintaining one's composure and morality, no matter how extraordinarily difficult it is, is the true task that they must tackle. This has been the way of the world for thousands of years. Only those rotund, boastful men can be cold-hearted enough to think so.

CN_006.title: Talk after Promotion 2
CN_006.text: The world is a vast place, and wonderful sceneries abound, yet man has limited strength and time. It is impossible to see all these sights, much less defend them. To those who practice the martial arts, all we can do is let time take its course, let the seasons pass, and train from winter solstice to summer. It may be somewhat foolish, but what matters most is to have no regrets and to do what you can to the best of your ability.

CN_007.title: Talk after Trust Increase 1
CN_007.text: That sword is a worldly possession that must not be frivolously cast away. Its falling into Huai Tianpei's hands is an outcome with which all concerned parties are satisfied. The duel, you ask? He trained for forty years and landed a single blow on me, but how many comings and goings of springs and autumns have I trained? All things considered, I was the one who lost.

CN_008.title: Talk after Trust Increase 2
CN_008.text: 'Who am I...?' You need only gaze upon the water. Be it human, beast, mountains, the smoke in the woods, or the reflection of the twin moons on the night sky, whatever it is you see, that is your answer. As for whether we siblings will return to chaos and seek a new answer at the end of our time in the mortal realm, that is an entirely different question.

CN_009.title: Talk after Trust Increase 3
CN_009.text: The scholars at court seek perfect answers in everything. The kung fu practitioners who wander the lands seek revenge, status, glory, or nothing more than to prove their point. Their obsessions run deep, yet there is too little time. Often, they spend their whole lifetimes for a single ideal or undertaking. How woeful and pitiful, how respectable and regrettable!

CN_010.title: Idle
CN_010.text: The spring comes and goes, leaving the autumn heart despondent.

CN_011.title: Onboard
CN_011.text: Doctor, thank you kindly for taking care of my sisters. I will be intruding upon Rhodes Island for a little while. Please, call me 'Chongyue.' It's... a name given to me by... someone who passed away some time ago.

CN_012.title: Watching Battle Record
CN_012.text: The colors that once embellished these fields' autumn grass can no longer be seen.

CN_013.title: Promotion 1
CN_013.text: Often I think about those soldiers who traveled from all corners of Great Yan to Yumen and risked their lives in battle until all the hairs on their heads turned white... earning neither merit nor honor.

CN_014.title: Promotion 2
CN_014.text: Doctor, when we have fought alongside each other and braved death together, words are no longer necessary.

CN_017.title: Added to Squad
CN_017.text: The signal fires of the city walls are inevitably relit immediately after they are extinguished like so.

CN_018.title: Appointed as Squad Leader
CN_018.text: In that case, Doctor, will you beat the drums for me as we sortie?

CN_019.title: Depart
CN_019.text: With its colorful fabric, the sunset weaves a long river. Heaven and earth shall bolster my departure.

CN_020.title: Begin Operation
CN_020.text: The leaves in the wind have yet to settle, and thus I wear this armor.

CN_021.title: Selecting Operator 1
CN_021.text: 三不之也要试一下拳脚。

CN_023.title: Deployment 1
CN_023.text: Look at the spectacular sight before us. Alas, it has become a battlefield.

CN_024.title: Deployment 2
CN_024.text: Many intellectuals fail to write a truly great verse until they find themselves on the battlefield, including that sister of mine... This too is an opportunity.

CN_025.title: In Battle 1
CN_025.text: Your posture and intent have much room for improvement.

CN_026.title: In Battle 2
CN_026.text: A thousand moves and hundred styles in one breath!

CN_027.title: In Battle 3
CN_027.text: Striking fist parts even the waters, withdrawn fist leaves all in peace.

CN_028.title: In Battle 4
CN_028.text: Must you always solve your problems with war?

CN_029.title: 4-star Result
CN_029.text: You calmly place your pieces to plot your victory... Doctor, a chess player like you is a truly rare sight.

CN_030.title: 3-star Result
CN_030.text: A thousand armies move at the beating of your war drums, kicking up the sands and dying the warriors' armor yellow... A brilliant victory!

CN_031.title: Sub 3-star Result
CN_031.text: There was never truly a victory to be found in war and destruction. True merits and missteps are even harder to determine. All is well, as long as you have no regrets.

CN_032.title: Operation Failure
CN_032.text: All warriors must face defeat. Cheer up.

CN_033.title: Assigned to Facility
CN_033.text: 这里比军帐舒服多了，冒得了将士们操练的声响，不晓得会不会睡个好觉咧......

CN_034.title: Tap
CN_034.text: Doctor, have you perhaps managed that move from yesterday?

CN_036.title: Trust Tap
CN_036.text: The times are changing, and man along with them. So too does the scenery change.

CN_042.title: Greeting
CN_042.text: Doctor, I did not see you at this morning's training session.

CN_001.title: 秘書任命
CN_001.text: 貴公が私の「録武官」になるというのか？ははっ、ロドスのもてなしには感銘を受けるな。うちの妹たちがここを気に入るわけだ……ん、誤解？なに、私が貴公の副将となるのでも構わんさ。

CN_002.title: 会話1
CN_002.text: ドクター、つまり「博士」か。この称号はかつて付き合いがあった炎国の学士を思い出すな。広い知見を持ち、一を聞いて十を知る者よ。なんだ、私を旧友のように感じる？確かにあの混沌の夢から覚めた後には多くの場所に行ったがな……知る辺が増えるほど、寂寥感も募るのだ。この点においては、貴公と私は少し似ているかもな。

CN_003.title: 会話2
CN_003.text: 見ての通り、私が日頃書き記しているのはちょっとした体得で、具体的な技や型ではない。武道は「意」にあり、派手な外見ばかりに囚われてしまえば、壁を越えるのは難事になる。例えばシーの描いた絵の含意を理解もしないのに、本人を捕まえて筆力やら技法やらの議論を続けたら、部屋から閉め出されるだろう？そういうことだ。

CN_004.title: 会話3
CN_004.text: ニェンの映画のアクション指導をしてやると約束したんだ。あまり無茶苦茶されてもかなわないし、これで多少は寂しさも薄れるだろう。シーは肝っ玉が小さくて、リィンは酒に目がないから、あれらも気にかけておかねばな……我らは並みの者ではないが、それでも兄妹であり、どこぞで言われているような「我ら」ではないんだ。

CN_005.title: 昇進後会話1
CN_005.text: 死と苦難に行き当たるのは、戦場に立つ武人の日常だ。かような難場を目の当たりにして「世はこういうもの」と濁すのではなく、己の意志をしかと持ち続け、道義に悖ることなく在り続けることこそ、彼らの真の課題だ。生きるとは悠久の昔からこうなんだ。関心を持たないのは、図体がでかくて傲慢なあやつらくらいのものさ。

CN_006.title: 昇進後会話2
CN_006.text: 大地は広く雄大で、美しい風景は数え切れない。だが人の気力と時間には限りがあり、隅から隅まで歩くこともできなければ、全てを理解することも、全てを守り切ることもできはしない。武を修める者にとって、できることは季節の巡りに任せて、暑くとも寒くともひたすらに修練し、修行を重ね続けることだけだ。愚直なやりようではあるがな、己に悔いなく、力の限りを尽くせるのならば上々さ。

CN_007.title: 信頼上昇後会話1
CN_007.text: あの剣はぞんざいに扱ってはならない「身外の物」だ。今ワイ・テンペイの手中に渡ったのなら、関係各所にとっても受け入れられる結果だろう。例の決闘のことか？あの者は四十年の厳しい修練を経て、私に一撃を与えた。では、私の方はこれまで幾度の春秋を鍛錬で過ごしたと思う？数えてみれば、負けたのは私の方だな。

CN_008.title: 信頼上昇後会話2
CN_008.text: 「我とは誰か」……湖面に映された己を見てみろ。人といい、獣といい、連綿たる山脈や林にたなびく煙、あるいは空に浮かぶ双月の姿といい、そこにあるもの全てが答えだ。人の世の千年万年後、我ら兄弟姉妹が混沌へと還り、再び答え探しの旅に就くことになるかどうか、それはまた別の問題さ。

CN_009.title: 信頼上昇後会話3
CN_009.text: 朝廷に身を置く者は完璧を求め、解答を求めるもの。江湖に身を置く者は、仇のため、怨みのため、身分のため、勝敗のため、ひいては単なる「けじめ」のために動くもの。執念の深さに比べれば、時というのはあまりに短く、たった一つの執着、一つの出来事が彼らの一生を支配するのだ。人よ、なんと憐れみ、悲しむべきものか。敬い、嘆じるべきものか！

CN_010.title: 放置
CN_010.text: ……春景来たりては去れど、悵然たる心は秋の如し。

CN_011.title: 入職会話
CN_011.text: ドクター、妹たちの面倒を見てもらっているようでかたじけないな。私の方も、これからしばらく世話になる。「チョンユエ」と呼んでくれればいい。……ああ、古い知り合いがくれた名だ。

CN_012.title: 経験値上昇
CN_012.text: 野の秋草も、もはや元の色が見えぬな。

CN_013.title: 昇進Ⅰ
CN_013.text: 時折、あの将兵たちのことを思い出すんだ。炎の各地から玉門へと集って……一生を戦の中で過ごし、生死の際で戦い、けれどもそのすべては己が功績のためではないのだ。

CN_014.title: 昇進Ⅱ
CN_014.text: 同袍同沢の情、生死の交わりには、多く語る必要はないさ、ドクター。

CN_017.title: 編成
CN_017.text: 城壁上の狼煙は、絶えず消えては燃える。

CN_018.title: 隊長任命
CN_018.text: そういうことならば、ドクター。後ほど出撃する際には、陣太鼓を叩いてくれるんだよな？

CN_019.title: 作戦準備
CN_019.text: 日落ちて飛錦の如き薄雲長河をぬいとり、天地我が行色を壮にす。

CN_020.title: 戦闘開始
CN_020.text: 征蓬未だ定まらず、甲冑我が身にあり。

CN_021.title: 選択時1
CN_021.text: たまには体を動かさねばな。

CN_023.title: 配置1
CN_023.text: 見よ、眼前の風景のなんと美しいことよ。戦場となったことが口惜しいな。

CN_024.title: 配置2
CN_024.text: うちの妹も含め、どれほどの文人が戦場に身を置いて、ようやく名文を生み出せたか……これもまた、良き出会いと言えるだろう。

CN_025.title: 作戦中1
CN_025.text: 形形を成さず、意意いにあらず。修行し直してこい。

CN_026.title: 作戦中2
CN_026.text: 千招百式、一息のうちにあり！

CN_027.title: 作戦中3
CN_027.text: 勁発すれば江潮落ちるが如く、気収まれば秋毫平らかなり！

CN_028.title: 作戦中4
CN_028.text: 貴様らの問題解決は、変わらず武頼りなのだな？

CN_029.title: 高難度作戦クリア
CN_029.text: 周到に石を置き、勝利を手繰る……ドクターよ、よもや貴公もまた稀に見る棋士であったとはな。

CN_030.title: ★3で戦闘終了
CN_030.text: 鼓の一音で全軍がわき、黄砂を掬って鉄衣を洗う……実に痛快な大勝だ！

CN_031.title: ★2以下戦闘終了
CN_031.text: 武での衝突といい、知略での謀り合いといい、本当の勝ち負けなどないし、功罪などなおさら定められない。己の心に恥じるところがなければそれでいいんだ。

CN_032.title: 作戦失敗
CN_032.text: 勝敗は戦いの常だ。しゃんとしろ。

CN_033.title: 基地配属
CN_033.text: ここは軍の天幕よりもずっと快適ではないか。兵士たちの訓練の声も聞こえないし、よく眠れそうだな……

CN_034.title: タッチ1
CN_034.text: ドクター、昨日見せた技の対処法を思いついたのか？

CN_036.title: 信頼タッチ
CN_036.text: 時代が異なれば人も変わる。風景もまた然り。

CN_042.title: 挨拶
CN_042.text: ドクター、今日の朝練にもいなかったな。

CN_001.title: 秘書任命
CN_001.text: 貴公が私の「録武官」になるというのか？ははっ、ロドスのもてなしには感銘を受けるな。うちの妹たちがここを気に入るわけだ……ん、誤解？なに、私が貴公の副将となるのでも構わんさ。

CN_014.title: 昇進Ⅱ
CN_014.text: 同袍同沢の情、生死の交わりには、多く語る必要はないさ、ドクター。

CN_017.text: 城壁上の狼煙は、絶えず消えては燃える。

CN_018.text: そういうことならば、ドクター。後ほど出撃する際には、陣太鼓を叩いてくれるんだよな？

CN_019.text: 日落ちて飛錦の如き薄雲長河をぬいとり、天地我が行色を壮にす。

CN_020.title: 戦闘開始
CN_020.text: 征蓬未だ定まらず、甲冑我が身にあり。

CN_021.title: 選択時1
CN_021.text: たまには体を動かさねばな。

CN_023.text: 見よ、眼前の風景のなんと美しいことよ。戦場となったことが口惜しいな。

CN_024.title: 配置2
CN_024.text: うちの妹も含め、どれほどの文人が戦場に身を置いて、ようやく名文を生み出せたか……これもまた、良き出会いと言えるだろう。

CN_025.text: 形形を成さず、意意いにあらず。修行し直してこい。

CN_026.title: 作戦中2
CN_026.text: 千招百式、一息のうちにあり！

CN_027.title: 作戦中3

CN_028.title: 作戦中4
